<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Translingual">Translingual</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: Translingual">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="noprint" style="clear: right; border: solid #aaa 1px; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left; float: right;">
 <div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><a href="/wiki/File:Wikisource-logo.svg" class="image" title="Wikisource"><img alt="Wikisource" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/50px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="52" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/75px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4c/Wikisource-logo.svg/100px-Wikisource-logo.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="410" data-file-height="430" /></a></div></div>
 <div style="margin-left: 60px;">See also the <a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/1911_Encyclop%C3%A6dia_Britannica" class="extiw" title="s:1911 Encyclopædia Britannica">1911 Encyclopædia Britannica</a>'s article on:
  <div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b><a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/1911_Encyclop%C3%A6dia_Britannica/A" class="extiw" title="s:1911 Encyclopædia Britannica/A">A</a></b>.</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><a href="/wiki/File:UncialA-01.svg" class="image" title="Approximate form of Greek upper case Α (a, “alpha”) that was the source for both common variants of a"><img alt="Approximate form of Greek upper case Α (a, “alpha”) that was the source for both common variants of a" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/50px-UncialA-01.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="41" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/75px-UncialA-01.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/100px-UncialA-01.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="58" data-file-height="47" /></a>
Modification of capital letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/A#Translingual" title="A">A</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> letter <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%CE%91#Ancient_Greek" title="Α">Α</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">A</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter, most languages</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Translingual_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Translingual pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span>, <span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>
<li><style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r50165410">.mw-parser-output .k-player .k-attribution{visibility:hidden}</style><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">IPA</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_0" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.58374149659864" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Open_front_unrounded_vowel.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/6/65/Open_front_unrounded_vowel.ogg/Open_front_unrounded_vowel.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="183656" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/65/Open_front_unrounded_vowel.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (188 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="188412" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Open_front_unrounded_vowel.ogg" title="File:Open front unrounded vowel.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong> (<i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/A#Translingual" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first letter of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">basic modern Latin alphabet</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong>
</p>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">English <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/open_front_unrounded_vowel" class="extiw" title="w:open front unrounded vowel">open front unrounded vowel</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/open_front_unrounded_vowel" class="extiw" title="w:open front unrounded vowel">Wikipedia </a></span></div>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Phonetic_Alphabet" class="extiw" title="w:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">Used in the <a href="/wiki/International_Phonetic_Alphabet#English" title="International Phonetic Alphabet">International Phonetic Alphabet</a> and in several romanization systems of non-Latin scripts to represent an <a href="/wiki/open#English" title="open">open</a> <a href="/wiki/front#English" title="front">front</a> <a href="/wiki/unrounded#English" title="unrounded">unrounded</a> <a href="/wiki/vowel#English" title="vowel">vowel</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Abbreviation of <i class="Latn mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/atto-#Translingual" title="atto-">atto-</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Danish language">Danish</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/atten#Danish" title="atten">atten</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">eighteen</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_2">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/atto-#English" title="atto-">atto-</a>, the prefix for 10<sup>-18</sup> in the <a href="/wiki/International_System_of_Units#English" title="International System of Units">International System of Units</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/annus#Latin" title="annus">annus</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_3">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>A <a href="/wiki/year" title="year">year</a> in <a href="/wiki/SI" title="SI">SI</a> Units, specifically a <a href="/wiki/Julian_year" title="Julian year">Julian year</a> or exactly 365.25 days.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Abbreviation of <a href="/wiki/are" title="are">are</a>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language">French</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/are#French" title="are">are</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_4">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=13" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>An <a href="/wiki/are" title="are">are</a>, a unit of area of which 100 comprise a <a href="/wiki/hectare" title="hectare">hectare</a>; ares.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=14" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Abbreviation of <a href="/wiki/acceleration" title="acceleration">acceleration</a>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_5">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=15" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mul">a</strong>

</td>
<td>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/semaphore" title="semaphore">Semaphore</a>: <a href="/wiki/File:Semaphore_Alpha.svg" class="image"><img alt="Semaphore Alpha.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Semaphore_Alpha.svg/90px-Semaphore_Alpha.svg.png" decoding="async" width="90" height="75" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Semaphore_Alpha.svg/135px-Semaphore_Alpha.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Semaphore_Alpha.svg/180px-Semaphore_Alpha.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="500" /></a></li></ul>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Gallery">Gallery</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=16" title="Edit section: Gallery">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul class="gallery mw-gallery-packed">
	<li class="gallerycaption">Letter styles</li>
		<li class="gallerybox" style="width: 89.333333333333px"><div style="width: 89.333333333333px">
			<div class="thumb" style="width: 87.333333333333px;"><div style="margin:0px auto;"><a href="/wiki/File:Latin_A.png" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Latin_A.png/131px-Latin_A.png" decoding="async" width="88" height="120" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Latin_A.png/197px-Latin_A.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Latin_A.png/262px-Latin_A.png 2x" data-file-width="445" data-file-height="611" /></a></div></div>
			<div class="gallerytext">
<p>Capital and lowercase versions of <b>A</b>, in normal and italic type
</p>
			</div>
		</div></li>
		<li class="gallerybox" style="width: 242px"><div style="width: 242px">
			<div class="thumb" style="width: 240px;"><div style="margin:0px auto;"><a href="/wiki/File:Fraktur_letter_A.png" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4c/Fraktur_letter_A.png" decoding="async" width="240" height="120" data-file-width="100" data-file-height="50" /></a></div></div>
			<div class="gallerytext">
<p>Uppercase and lowercase <b>A</b> in <a href="/wiki/Fraktur" title="Fraktur">Fraktur</a>
</p>
			</div>
		</div></li>
		<li class="gallerybox" style="width: 150px"><div style="width: 150px">
			<div class="thumb" style="width: 148px;"><div style="margin:0px auto;"><a href="/wiki/File:UncialA-01.svg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/222px-UncialA-01.svg.png" decoding="async" width="148" height="120" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/333px-UncialA-01.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ee/UncialA-01.svg/444px-UncialA-01.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="58" data-file-height="47" /></a></div></div>
			<div class="gallerytext">
<p>Approximate form of Greek upper case Α (a, “alpha”) that was the source for both common variants of <i>a</i><b>A</b> in <a href="/wiki/uncial" title="uncial">uncial</a> script
</p>
			</div>
		</div></li>
</ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="English">English</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=17" title="Edit section: English">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="noprint maintenance-box maintenance-box-blue" style="background:#EEEEFF; width:90%; margin: 0.75em auto; border:1px dashed #4444AA; padding: 0.25em;">
<table>
<tbody><tr>
<td rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/File:Broom_icon.svg" class="image"><img alt="Broom icon.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Broom_icon.svg/50px-Broom_icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="50" height="50" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Broom_icon.svg/75px-Broom_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Broom_icon.svg/100px-Broom_icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="400" data-file-height="400" /></a>
</td>
<th style="text-align: left;">A user suggests that this English entry be cleaned up, giving the reason: <b>""Brown, Lesley, (2003)", "Lindberg, Christine A. (2007)", "Gove, Philip Babcock, (1976)" need more information. Title? Page(s) or headword(s)? Note: By year, it's not the same as the other mentioned work by these persons.</b>
<p>Also clean up the sense "He, or sometimes she, it. [1150-1900]". Does it mean "he, she, it" (making it a genderless 3rd person personal pronoun)? Or "he" in some regions, and "she" or "it" or "he, she, it" in others (being both, a gendered 3rd person personal pronoun in some regions, and a differently gendered or genderless 3rd person personal pronoun in some other regions.)?
"<b>.</b>
</p>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td>Please see the discussion on <b><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:Requests_for_cleanup#a" title="Wiktionary:Requests for cleanup">Requests for cleanup</a></b><sup class="plainlinks" title="Start discussion">(<a class="external text" href="https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?title=Wiktionary:Requests_for_cleanup&amp;action=edit&amp;section=new&amp;preloadtitle=%5B%5B%3Aa%5D%5D">+</a>)</sup> or the <a href="/wiki/Talk:a" title="Talk:a">talk page</a> for more information and remove this template after the problem has been dealt with.
</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_2">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=18" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="floatleft"><a href="/wiki/File:Runic_letter_ansuz.png" class="image" title="Runic letter ᚫ (a, “ansuz”), source for Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letters replaced by a"><img alt="Runic letter ᚫ (a, “ansuz”), source for Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letters replaced by a" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Runic_letter_ansuz.png/30px-Runic_letter_ansuz.png" decoding="async" width="30" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Runic_letter_ansuz.png/45px-Runic_letter_ansuz.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/35/Runic_letter_ansuz.png/60px-Runic_letter_ansuz.png 2x" data-file-width="150" data-file-height="200" /></a></div>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> and <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> lower case letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i> and split of <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> and <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> lower case letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A6#Middle_English" title="æ">æ</a></i>.
</p>
<dl><dd><ul><li><a href="/wiki/File:Rune-Ac.png" class="image" title="Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter ᚪ (a, “āc”)"><img alt="Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter ᚪ (a, “āc”)" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Rune-Ac.png/10px-Rune-Ac.png" decoding="async" width="10" height="16" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Rune-Ac.png/15px-Rune-Ac.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ad/Rune-Ac.png/20px-Rune-Ac.png 2x" data-file-width="103" data-file-height="160" /></a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> lower case letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i> from 7th century replacement by Latin lower case letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/a#Latin" title="a">a</a></i> of the Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter <i class="Runr mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/%E1%9A%AA#Translingual" title="ᚪ">ᚪ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="mul-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">āc</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, derived from Runic letter <i class="Runr mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/%E1%9A%AB#Translingual" title="ᚫ">ᚫ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="mul-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">Ansuz</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/File:Rune-%C3%86sc.png" class="image" title="Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter ᚫ (æ, “æsc”)"><img alt="Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter ᚫ (æ, “æsc”)" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7f/Rune-%C3%86sc.png/10px-Rune-%C3%86sc.png" decoding="async" width="10" height="17" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7f/Rune-%C3%86sc.png/15px-Rune-%C3%86sc.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7f/Rune-%C3%86sc.png/20px-Rune-%C3%86sc.png 2x" data-file-width="90" data-file-height="156" /></a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> lower case letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A6#Middle_English" title="æ">æ</a></i> from 7th century replacement by Latin lower case ligature <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A6#Latin" title="æ">æ</a></i> of the Anglo-Saxon Futhorc letter <i class="Runr mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/%E1%9A%AB#Translingual" title="ᚫ">ᚫ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="mul-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">æ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">æsc</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, also derived from Runic letter <i class="Runr mention" lang="mul"><a href="/wiki/%E1%9A%AB#Translingual" title="ᚫ">ᚫ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="mul-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">Ansuz</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.</li></ul></dd></dl>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=19" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregg_Shorthand" class="extiw" title="w:Gregg Shorthand">Gregg Shorthand</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/%C2%B7" title="·">·</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">dot</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_2">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=20" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_English" class="extiw" title="w:British English">UK</a><span class="ib-comma qualifier-comma">,</span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_English" class="extiw" title="w:American English">US</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/eɪ/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (US)</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_1" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.64149659863946" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="en-us-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/52/En-us-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (132 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="131692" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/5/52/En-us-a.ogg/En-us-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:en-us-a.ogg" title="File:en-us-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_English_phonology" class="extiw" title="w:Australian English phonology">General Australian</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/æɪ/</span></li>
<li>Rhymes: <a href="/wiki/Rhymes:English/e%C9%AA" title="Rhymes:English/eɪ"><span class="IPA">-eɪ</span></a></li></ul>
<dl><dd>The current pronunciation resulted from the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Vowel_Shift" class="extiw" title="w:Great Vowel Shift">Great Vowel Shift</a>. Before the early part of the 17th century, the pronunciation was similar to that in other languages.</dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">phoneme</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <span class="IPA">/æ/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span>, <span class="IPA">/eɪ/</span>, ...</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_2">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=21" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></b>, <i>plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a%27s#English" title="a&#39;s">a's</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the English <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=22" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>In English, the letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></i> usually denotes the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/near-open_front_unrounded_vowel" class="extiw" title="w:near-open front unrounded vowel">near-open front unrounded vowel</a> (<span class="IPA">/æ/</span>), as in <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/pad#English" title="pad">pad</a></i>, the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/open_back_unrounded_vowel" class="extiw" title="w:open back unrounded vowel">open back unrounded vowel</a> (<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span>) as in <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/father#English" title="father">father</a></i>, or, followed by another vowel, the diphthong <span class="IPA">/eɪ/</span>, as in <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/ace#English" title="ace">ace</a></i>.
</p><p><i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></i> is the third most common letter in English.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Derived_terms">Derived terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=23" title="Edit section: Derived terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
