<ul><li>(<i>Latin script letters</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a></b>; <a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a><a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/B" title="B">B</a><a href="/wiki/b" title="b">b</a>, <a href="/wiki/C" title="C">C</a><a href="/wiki/c" title="c">c</a>, <a href="/wiki/D" title="D">D</a><a href="/wiki/d" title="d">d</a>, <a href="/wiki/E" title="E">E</a><a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/F" title="F">F</a><a href="/wiki/f" title="f">f</a>, <a href="/wiki/G" title="G">G</a><a href="/wiki/g" title="g">g</a>, <a href="/wiki/H" title="H">H</a><a href="/wiki/h" title="h">h</a>, <a href="/wiki/I" title="I">I</a><a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/J" title="J">J</a><a href="/wiki/j" title="j">j</a>, <a href="/wiki/K" title="K">K</a><a href="/wiki/k" title="k">k</a>, <a href="/wiki/L" title="L">L</a><a href="/wiki/l" title="l">l</a>, <a href="/wiki/M" title="M">M</a><a href="/wiki/m" title="m">m</a>, <a href="/wiki/N" title="N">N</a><a href="/wiki/n" title="n">n</a>, <a href="/wiki/O" title="O">O</a><a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/P" title="P">P</a><a href="/wiki/p" title="p">p</a>, <a href="/wiki/Q" title="Q">Q</a><a href="/wiki/q" title="q">q</a>, <a href="/wiki/R" title="R">R</a><a href="/wiki/r" title="r">r</a>, <a href="/wiki/S" title="S">S</a><a href="/wiki/s" title="s">s</a>, <a href="/wiki/T" title="T">T</a><a href="/wiki/t" title="t">t</a>, <a href="/wiki/U" title="U">U</a><a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/V" title="V">V</a><a href="/wiki/v" title="v">v</a>, <a href="/wiki/W" title="W">W</a><a href="/wiki/w" title="w">w</a>, <a href="/wiki/X" title="X">X</a><a href="/wiki/x" title="x">x</a>, <a href="/wiki/Y" title="Y">Y</a><a href="/wiki/y" title="y">y</a>, <a href="/wiki/Z" title="Z">Z</a><a href="/wiki/z" title="z">z</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Latin-script letter names</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <b class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/letter#English" title="letter">letter</a></b>; <strong class="selflink">a</strong>, <a href="/wiki/bee#English" title="bee">bee</a>, <a href="/wiki/cee#English" title="cee">cee</a>, <a href="/wiki/dee#English" title="dee">dee</a>, <a href="/wiki/e#English" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/ef#English" title="ef">ef</a>, <a href="/wiki/gee#English" title="gee">gee</a>, <a href="/wiki/aitch#English" title="aitch">aitch</a>, <a href="/wiki/i#English" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/jay#English" title="jay">jay</a>, <a href="/wiki/kay#English" title="kay">kay</a>, <a href="/wiki/el#English" title="el">el</a>, <a href="/wiki/em#English" title="em">em</a>, <a href="/wiki/en#English" title="en">en</a>, <a href="/wiki/o#English" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/pee#English" title="pee">pee</a>, <a href="/wiki/cue#English" title="cue">cue</a>, <a href="/wiki/ar#English" title="ar">ar</a>, <a href="/wiki/ess#English" title="ess">ess</a>, <a href="/wiki/tee#English" title="tee">tee</a>, <a href="/wiki/u#English" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/vee#English" title="vee">vee</a>, <a href="/wiki/double-u#English" title="double-u">double-u</a>, <a href="/wiki/ex#English" title="ex">ex</a>, <a href="/wiki/wye#English" title="wye">wye</a>, <a href="/wiki/zee#English" title="zee">zee</a> / <a href="/wiki/zed#English" title="zed">zed</a></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=25" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The <a href="/wiki/ordinal#English" title="ordinal">ordinal</a> number <b><a href="/wiki/first#English" title="first">first</a></b>, derived from this <a href="/wiki/letter#English" title="letter">letter</a> of the English <a href="/wiki/alphabet#English" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called a and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=26" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-en p-form-of" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/aes#English" title="aes">aes</a></b>)<sup id="cite_ref-WI3_1-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WI3-1">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a> letter <b><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></b>/<b><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></b>.</span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_3">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=27" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latin script letter names</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a></b>; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/bee" title="bee">bee</a>, <a href="/wiki/cee" title="cee">cee</a>, <a href="/wiki/dee" title="dee">dee</a>, <a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/ef" title="ef">ef</a>, <a href="/wiki/gee" title="gee">gee</a>, <a href="/wiki/aitch" title="aitch">aitch</a>, <a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/jay" title="jay">jay</a>, <a href="/wiki/kay" title="kay">kay</a>, <a href="/wiki/el" title="el">el</a>, <a href="/wiki/em" title="em">em</a>, <a href="/wiki/en" title="en">en</a>, <a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/pee" title="pee">pee</a>, <a href="/wiki/cue" title="cue">cue</a>, <a href="/wiki/ar" title="ar">ar</a>, <a href="/wiki/ess" title="ess">ess</a>, <a href="/wiki/tee" title="tee">tee</a>, <a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/vee" title="vee">vee</a>, <a href="/wiki/double-u" title="double-u">double-u</a>, <a href="/wiki/ex" title="ex">ex</a>, <a href="/wiki/wye" title="wye">wye</a>, <a href="/wiki/zee" title="zee">zee</a>/<a href="/wiki/zed" title="zed">zed</a> <sup>(Category: <a href="/wiki/Category:en:Latin_letter_names" title="Category:en:Latin letter names">en:Latin letter names</a>)</sup></li></ul>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Translations">Translations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=28" title="Edit section: Translations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>See <a href="/wiki/a/translations#Noun" title="a/translations">a/translations § Noun</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=29" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang"><a href="/wiki/an#Old_English" title="an">ān</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">one; a; lone; sole</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. The "n" was gradually lost before consonants in almost all dialects by the 15th century.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_3">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=30" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">stressed</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/eɪ/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">unstressed</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (US), stressed</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_2" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.5340589569161" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="en-us-a-stressed.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/59/En-us-a-stressed.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (147 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="147489" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/5/59/En-us-a-stressed.ogg/En-us-a-stressed.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:en-us-a-stressed.ogg" title="File:en-us-a-stressed.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (US), unstressed</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_3" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.37151927437642" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="en-us-a-unstressed.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/00/En-us-a-unstressed.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (173 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="172782" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/0/00/En-us-a-unstressed.ogg/En-us-a-unstressed.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:en-us-a-unstressed.ogg" title="File:en-us-a-unstressed.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li>
<li><span class="homophones"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#homophone" title="Appendix:Glossary">Homophone</a>: <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/her#English" title="her">her</a></span></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">non-rhotic, unstressed</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=31" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong> (<i>indefinite</i>)
</p>
<ol><li>One; any indefinite example of; used to denote a singular item of a group. <span class="defdate">[First attested prior to 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">There was <b>a</b> man here looking for you yesterday.</i></div></dd></dl>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1992</b>,  Rudolf M[athias] Schuster,  <cite>The Hepaticae and Anthocerotae of North America: East of the Hundredth Meridian</cite>, volume V, New York, N.Y.&#58; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Columbia_University_Press" class="extiw" title="w:Columbia University Press">Columbia University Press</a>, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-914868-20-0" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-914868-20-0">→ISBN</a></small>, page vii:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="en">With fresh material, taxonomic conclusions are leavened by recognition that the material examined reflects the site it occupied; <b>a</b> herbarium packet gives one only <b>a</b> small fraction of the data desirable for sound conclusions. Herbarium material does not, indeed, allow one to extrapolate safely: what you see is what you get<span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></span></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><b>2005</b>, Emily Kingsley (lyricist), Kevin Clash (voice actor), “A Cookie is a Sometime Food”, <i>Sesame Street</i>, season 36, Sesame Workshop:
<dl><dd><i>Hoots the Owl:</i> Yes a, fruit, is <b>a</b> <sup style="font-style:normal">[<i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#sic" title="Appendix:Glossary">sic</a></i>]</sup>, any, time, food!</dd></dl></li>
<li><b>2016</b>, <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170925022505/https://learningenglish.voanews.com/a/lets-learn-english-lesson-4/3168920.html">VOA Learning English</a> (public domain)
<dl><dd>Anna, do you have a pen?  —  Yes. I have a pen in my bag. I have <b>a</b> (stressed) …
<dl><dd><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (US)</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_4" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="8.5466439909297" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Anna,_do_you_have_a_pen.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/1/1e/Anna%2C_do_you_have_a_pen.ogg/Anna%2C_do_you_have_a_pen.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="122496" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/1e/Anna%2C_do_you_have_a_pen.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (141 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="140855" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Anna,_do_you_have_a_pen.ogg" title="File:Anna, do you have a pen.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">Used in conjunction with the adjectives score, dozen, hundred, thousand, and million, as a function word.</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">I've seen it happen <b>a</b> hundred times.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>One certain or particular; any single. <span class="defdate">[First attested between around 1150 and 1350]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">We've received an interesting letter from <b>a</b> Mrs. Miggins of London.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>The same; one. <span class="defdate">[16th Century]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">We are of <b>a</b> mind on matters of morals.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/any" title="any">Any</a>, <a href="/wiki/every" title="every">every</a>; used before a noun which has become modified to limit its scope;<sup id="cite_ref-WI3_1-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WI3-1">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup> also used with a negative to indicate not a single one.<sup id="cite_ref-OCD_3-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OCD-3">&#91;3&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en"><b>A</b> man who dies intestate leaves his children troubles and difficulties.</i></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">He fell all that way, and hasn't <b>a</b> bump on his head?</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">Used before plural nouns modified by few, good many, couple, great many, etc.</span></li>
<li>Someone or something like; similar to;<sup id="cite_ref-OCD_3-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OCD-3">&#91;3&#93;</a></sup> <span class="use-with-mention">Used before a proper noun to create an example out of it.</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">The center of the village was becoming <b>a</b> Times Square.</i></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_2">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=32" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="disambig-see-also-2"><i>Main appendix:</i> <b><a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_articles#Indefinite_articles" title="Appendix:English articles">English articles#Indefinite articles</a></b></div>
<ul><li>In standard English, the article <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></i> is used before consonant sounds, while <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/an#English" title="an">an</a></i> is used before vowel sounds; for more, see <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/an#Usage_notes" title="an">the usage notes about <i>an</i></a></i>.</li></ul>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Translations_2">Translations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=33" title="Edit section: Translations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="pseudo NavFrame"><div class="NavHead" style="text-align: left;">an <span style="font-weight: normal">— <i>see</i></span> <a href="/wiki/an" title="an">an</a></div></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_2">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=34" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/o#Middle_English" title="o">o</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_English" class="extiw" title="w:Old English">Old English</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang"><a href="/wiki/a-#Old_English" title="a-">a-</a></i>, <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang"><a href="/wiki/an#Old_English" title="an">an</a></i>, <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ang"><a href="/wiki/on#Old_English" title="on">on</a></i>.</li>
<li>Unstressed form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/on#English" title="on">on</a></i>.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_4">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=35" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=36" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with position or direction;</span> In, on, at, by, towards, onto. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">Stand <b>a</b> tiptoe.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">To do with separation;</span> In, into. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">Torn <b>a</b> pieces.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">To do with time;</span> Each, per, in, on, by. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">I brush my teeth twice <b>a</b> day.</i></div></dd></dl>
<ul><li><b>1601</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Shakespeare" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:William Shakespeare">William Shakespeare</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamlet" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Hamlet">Hamlet</a></i>, IV-v
<dl><dd><b>A</b> Sundays</dd></dl></li>
<li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2019</b> February 3,  “UN Study: China, US, Japan Lead World AI Development”, in  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voice_of_America" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Voice of America">Voice of America</a></cite>&#8206;<sup><a rel="nofollow" class="external autonumber" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190207184548/https://learningenglish.voanews.com/a/un-study-china-us-japan-lead-world-ai-development/4769094.html">[2]</a></sup>, archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://learningenglish.voanews.com/a/un-study-china-us-japan-lead-world-ai-development/4769094.html">the original</a> on <span class="mw-formatted-date" title="2019-02-07">7 February 2019</span>:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="en">Patent requests for machine learning activities grew on average by 28 percent <b>a</b> year between 2013 and 2016, the study found.</span></div></dd></dl></div>
<dl><dd><dl><dd><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (US)</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_5" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="14.321632653061" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Patent_requests_for_machine_learning_activities_grew_on_average_by_28_percent_a_year_between_2013_and_2016,_the_study_found.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f6/Patent_requests_for_machine_learning_activities_grew_on_average_by_28_percent_a_year_between_2013_and_2016%2C_the_study_found.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (93 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="92521" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/f/f6/Patent_requests_for_machine_learning_activities_grew_on_average_by_28_percent_a_year_between_2013_and_2016%2C_the_study_found.ogg/Patent_requests_for_machine_learning_activities_grew_on_average_by_28_percent_a_year_between_2013_and_2016%2C_the_study_found.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="133528" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Patent_requests_for_machine_learning_activities_grew_on_average_by_28_percent_a_year_between_2013_and_2016,_the_study_found.ogg" title="File:Patent requests for machine learning activities grew on average by 28 percent a year between 2013 and 2016, the study found.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#obsolete" title="Appendix:Glossary">obsolete</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with method;</span> In, with. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<ul><li><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: #777777;">(Can we <a href="/wiki/Category:Requests_for_date" title="Category:Requests for date">date</a> this quote by Christopher Marlowe and provide title, author's full name, and other details?)</span>
<dl><dd>Stands here <b>a</b> purpose.</dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#obsolete" title="Appendix:Glossary">obsolete</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with role or capacity;</span> In. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en"><b>A</b> God’s name.</i></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">To do with status;</span> In. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_James_Bible" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:King James Bible">King James Bible</a></i> (II Chronicles 2:18)
<dl><dd>To set the people <b>a</b> worke.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with process, with a passive verb;</span> In the course of, experiencing. <span class="defdate">[First attested before 1150]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<dl><dd><b>1964</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Dylan" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Bob Dylan">Bob Dylan</a>, <i>The Times They Are a-Changin’</i>
<dl><dd>The times, they are <b>a</b>-changin'.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with an action, an active verb;</span> Engaged in. <span class="defdate">[16th century]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<ul><li><b>1605~1608</b> Shakespeare
<dl><dd>It was <b>a</b> doing.</dd></dl></li></ul>
<dl><dd><b>1611</b>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_James_Bible" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:King James Bible">King James Bible</a></i>, Hebrews 11-21
<dl><dd>Jacob, when he was <b>a</b> dying</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">To do with an action/movement;</span> To, into. <span class="defdate">[16th century]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_3">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=37" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">position, direction</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> Can also be attached without a hyphen, as <a href="/wiki/aback" title="aback">aback</a>, <a href="/wiki/ahorse" title="ahorse">ahorse</a>, <a href="/wiki/afoot" title="afoot">afoot</a>. See <a href="/wiki/a-" title="a-">a-</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">separation</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> Can also be attached without hyphen, as <a href="/wiki/asunder" title="asunder">asunder</a>. See <a href="/wiki/a-" title="a-">a-</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">status</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> Can also be attached without hyphen, as <a href="/wiki/afloat" title="afloat">afloat</a>, <a href="/wiki/awake" title="awake">awake</a>. See <a href="/wiki/a-" title="a-">a-</a>.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">process</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> Can also be attached with or without hyphen, as <a href="/wiki/a-changing" title="a-changing">a-changing</a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_2">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=38" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/ha#Middle_English" title="ha">ha</a></i> contraction of <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/have#Middle_English" title="have">have</a></i>, or <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/haven#Middle_English" title="haven">haven</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_2">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=39" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/%27a#English" title="&#39;a">'a</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/%27a%27#English" title="&#39;a&#39;">'a'</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/ha#English" title="ha">ha</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/ha%27#English" title="ha&#39;">ha'</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_5">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=40" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=41" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong> (<i>third-person singular simple present</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-en 3&#124;s&#124;pres-form-of" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/-#English" title="-">-</a></b>, <i>present participle</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-en pres&#124;ptcp-form-of" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/-#English" title="-">-</a></b>, <i>simple past and past participle</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-en past&#124;and&#124;past&#124;ptcp-form-of" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/-#English" title="-">-</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="English-have"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a>&#32;or&#32;<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#slang" title="Appendix:Glossary">slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/have" title="have">Have</a>. <span class="defdate">[between 1150 and 1350, continued in some use until 1650; used again after 1950]</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">I'd <b>a</b> come, if you'd <b>a</b> asked.</i></div></dd></dl>
<ul><li><b>1604</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Shakespeare" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:William Shakespeare">William Shakespeare</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamlet" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Hamlet">Hamlet</a></i>
<dl><dd>So would I <b>a</b> done by yonder ſunne</dd>
<dd>And thou hadſt not come to my bed.</dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Derived_terms_2">Derived terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=42" title="Edit section: Derived terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="list-switcher" data-toggle-category="derived terms"><div class="derivedterms term-list ul-column-count" data-column-count="3" style="background-color: #F8F8FF;">
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/coulda#English" title="coulda">coulda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/shoulda#English" title="shoulda">shoulda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/woulda#English" title="woulda">woulda</a></span></li></ul></div><div class="list-switcher-element" data-showtext="&#160;show more ▼&#160;" data-hidetext="&#160;show less ▲&#160;" style="display: none;">&#160;</div></div>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_4">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=43" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Now often attached to preceding auxiliary verb. See <a href="/wiki/-a" title="-a">-a</a>.</li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_2">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=44" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_English" title="a">a</a></i>, a reduced form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/he#Middle_English" title="he">he</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">he</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>/<i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/ha#Middle_English" title="ha">ha</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">he</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/heo#Middle_English" title="heo">heo</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">she</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>/<i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/ha#Middle_English" title="ha">ha</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">she</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/ha#Middle_English" title="ha">ha</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">it</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (as well as of <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/hie#Middle_English" title="hie">hie, hie</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">they</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>).
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_3">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=45" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/%27a#English" title="&#39;a">'a</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_6">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=46" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Received_Pronunciation" class="extiw" title="w:Received Pronunciation">Received Pronunciation</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">it</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Received_Pronunciation" class="extiw" title="w:Received Pronunciation">Received Pronunciation</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ɑ/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=47" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#obsolete" title="Appendix:Glossary">obsolete</a>&#32;outside&#32;<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England" class="extiw" title="w:England">England</a>&#32;and&#32;<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scotland" class="extiw" title="w:Scotland">Scotland</a>&#32;&#32;<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#dialectal" title="Appendix:Glossary">dialects</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/he" title="he">He</a>, <i>or sometimes</i> <a href="/wiki/she" title="she">she</a>, <a href="/wiki/it" title="it">it</a>. <span class="defdate">[1150-1900]</span><sup id="cite_ref-SOED_2-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-SOED-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1599</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shakespeare" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Shakespeare">Shakespeare</a>,  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Much_Ado_About_Nothing" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Much Ado About Nothing">Much Ado About Nothing</a>, III-ii</cite>:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="en"><b>a’</b> brushes his hat o’ mornings.</span></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><b>1874</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Hardy" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Thomas Hardy">Thomas Hardy</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Far_from_the_Madding_Crowd" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Far from the Madding Crowd">Far from the Madding Crowd</a></i> (Barnes &amp; Noble Classics reprint [reset], 2005, chapter 5, page 117; from "Hardy's 1912 Wessex edition"):
<dl><dd>"And how Farmer James would cuss, and call thee a fool, wouldn't he, Joseph, when <b>'a</b> seed his name looking so inside-out-like?" continued Matthew Moon, with feeling. / "Ay — <b>'a</b> would," said Joseph meekly.</dd></dl></li>
<li><b>1893</b> February, in <i>Littell's Living Age</i>, page 737:
<dl><dd>Martha quietly finished knitting the white stockings she meant to wear at Harry's and her wedding, knitting the more quickly when the two mothers were most dismal. Harry was hers now, she felt. "He was that set, a wudn't a gived in ef a 'adn't lost a lemb," she thought. And she felt sure she would never have given in; so it was 'all for the best.'</dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_6">Etymology 6</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=48" title="Edit section: Etymology 6">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Variant spelling of <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/ah#English" title="ah">ah</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_7">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=49" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=50" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>A meaningless syllable; <a href="/wiki/ah" title="ah">ah</a>.
<ul><li><b>1623</b> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shakespeare" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Shakespeare">Shakespeare</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Winter%E2%80%99s_Tale" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:The Winter’s Tale">The Winter’s Tale</a></i>, IV-iii
<dl><dd>A merry heart goes all the day</dd>
<dd>Your sad tires in a mile-<b>a</b></dd></dl></li>
<li><b>1936</b> Avery, <i>I Love to Singa</i>:
<dl><dd>I love to sing-<b>a</b></dd>
<dd>About the moon-<b>a</b> and the June-<b>a</b> and the Spring-<b>a</b>.</dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_7">Etymology 7</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=51" title="Edit section: Etymology 7">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/of#Middle_English" title="of">of</a></i>, with <a href="/wiki/apocope" title="apocope">apocope</a> of the final <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm">f</i> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/vowel_reduction" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:vowel reduction">vowel reduction</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_8">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=52" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_English" class="extiw" title="w:American English">US</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_2">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=53" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="en">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="English-of"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">archaic or slang</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> Of.
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="en">The name of John <b>a</b> Gaunt.</i></div></dd></dl>
<ul><li><i>a.</i> <b>1597</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shakespeare" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Shakespeare">Shakespeare</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_IV,_Part_1" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Henry IV, Part 1">Henry IV, Part 1</a></i>, I-ii
<dl><dd>What time <b>a</b> day is it?</dd></dl></li>
<li><b>1598</b>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Jonson" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Ben Jonson">Ben Jonson</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Every_man_in_his_humour" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Every man in his humour">Every man in his humour</a>
<dl><dd>It’s six <b>a</b> clock.</dd></dl></li>
<li><b>1931</b>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/When_I%27m_Gone_(Carter_Family_song)" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:When I&#39;m Gone (Carter Family song)">When I'm Gone</a></i>
<dl><dd>Two bottles '<b>a</b> whiskey for the way<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4">&#91;4&#93;</a></sup></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_5">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=54" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Often attached without a hyphen to preceding word.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_4">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=55" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/o%E2%80%99#English" class="mw-redirect" title="o’">o’</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/o#English-preposition" title="o">o</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_8">Etymology 8</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=56" title="Edit section: Etymology 8">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From (Northern dialect) <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_English" class="extiw" title="w:Middle English">Middle English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/aw#Middle_English" title="aw">aw</a></i>, alteration of <i class="Latn mention" lang="enm"><a href="/wiki/all#Middle_English" title="all">all</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_9">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=57" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Received_Pronunciation" class="extiw" title="w:Received Pronunciation">Received Pronunciation</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɔ/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_5">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=58" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_9">Etymology 9</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=61" title="Edit section: Etymology 9">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_6">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=62" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</p>
<ol><li>Distance from leading edge to aerodynamic center.</li>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Abau">Abau</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=68" title="Edit section: Abau">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_10">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=69" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abau_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Abau phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=70" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Albanian">Albanian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=71" title="Edit section: Albanian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_3">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=72" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Albanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Albanian language">Proto-Albanian</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sqj-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Albanian/(h)au&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Albanian/(h)au (page does not exist)">*(h)au</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82eu-&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂eu- (page does not exist)">*h₂eu-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">that</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Cognate to <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%CE%B1%E1%BD%96#Ancient_Greek" title="αὖ">αὖ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aû</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">on the other hand, again</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. A proclitic disjunctive particle, used with one or more parts of the sentence.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_11">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=73" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Albanian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Albanian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=74" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sq">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/or" title="or">or</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/there" title="there">there</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_3">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=75" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Albanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Albanian language">Proto-Albanian</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sqj-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Albanian/(h)an&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Albanian/(h)an (page does not exist)">*(h)an</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82en&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂en (page does not exist)">*h₂en</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">there</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/an#Latin" title="an">an</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">yes, perhaps</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Interrogative particle, usually used proclitically in simple sentences.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_12">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=76" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Albanian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Albanian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_2">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=77" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sq">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/probably" title="probably">probably</a>, <a href="/wiki/perhaps" title="perhaps">perhaps</a></li></ol>
<hr />

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Aragonese">Aragonese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=81" title="Edit section: Aragonese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=82" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_2">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=83" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Azerbaijani">Azerbaijani</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=89" title="Edit section: Azerbaijani">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_14">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=90" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">phoneme</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azerbaijani_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Azerbaijani phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑ/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_3">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=91" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="az">a</strong> <i>lower case</i> (<i>upper case</i> <b><a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Azerbaijani <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_4">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=100" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_15">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=101" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_4">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=102" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ca">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/A#Catalan" title="A">A</a></b>)

class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/B" title="B">B</a><a href="/wiki/b" title="b">b</a>, <a href="/wiki/C" title="C">C</a><a href="/wiki/c" title="c">c</a>, (<a href="/wiki/%C3%87" title="Ç">Ç</a><a href="/wiki/%C3%A7" title="ç">ç</a>), <a href="/wiki/D" title="D">D</a><a href="/wiki/d" title="d">d</a>, <a href="/wiki/E" title="E">E</a><a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/F" title="F">F</a><a href="/wiki/f" title="f">f</a>, <a href="/wiki/G" title="G">G</a><a href="/wiki/g" title="g">g</a>, <a href="/wiki/H" title="H">H</a><a href="/wiki/h" title="h">h</a>, <a href="/wiki/I" title="I">I</a><a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/J" title="J">J</a><a href="/wiki/j" title="j">j</a>, <a href="/wiki/K" title="K">K</a><a href="/wiki/k" title="k">k</a>, <a href="/wiki/L" title="L">L</a><a href="/wiki/l" title="l">l</a>, (<a href="/wiki/L%C2%B7L" title="L·L">L·L</a><a href="/wiki/l%C2%B7l" title="l·l">l·l</a>), <a href="/wiki/M" title="M">M</a><a href="/wiki/m" title="m">m</a>, <a href="/wiki/N" title="N">N</a><a href="/wiki/n" title="n">n</a>, <a href="/wiki/O" title="O">O</a><a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/P" title="P">P</a><a href="/wiki/p" title="p">p</a>, <a href="/wiki/Q" title="Q">Q</a><a href="/wiki/q" title="q">q</a>, <a href="/wiki/R" title="R">R</a><a href="/wiki/r" title="r">r</a>, <a href="/wiki/S" title="S">S</a><a href="/wiki/s" title="s">s</a>, <a href="/wiki/T" title="T">T</a><a href="/wiki/t" title="t">t</a>, <a href="/wiki/U" title="U">U</a><a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/V" title="V">V</a><a href="/wiki/v" title="v">v</a>, <a href="/wiki/W" title="W">W</a><a href="/wiki/w" title="w">w</a>, <a href="/wiki/X" title="X">X</a><a href="/wiki/x" title="x">x</a>, <a href="/wiki/Y" title="Y">Y</a><a href="/wiki/y" title="y">y</a>, <a href="/wiki/Z" title="Z">Z</a><a href="/wiki/z" title="z">z</a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_4">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=105" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near; at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_16">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=106" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Eastern</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Catalan_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Catalan pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Western</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Catalan_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Catalan pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_4">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=107" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ca">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/in" title="in">in</a>, <a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a>; indicating a particular time or place
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ca">Sóc <b>a</b> Barcelona.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">I am <b>in</b> Barcelona.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>; indicating movement towards a particular place
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ca">Vaig <b>a</b> Barcelona.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">I'm going <b>to</b> Barcelona.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>; indicating a target or indirect object
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ca">Escric una carta <b>a</b> la meva àvia.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">I'm writing my grandmother a letter.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/per" title="per">per</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/by" title="by">by</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ca">dia <b>a</b> dia.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">day by day.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_6">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=108" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>When the preposition <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca">a</i> is followed by a masculine definite article, <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/el#Catalan" title="el">el</a></i> or <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/els#Catalan" title="els">els</a></i>, it is contracted with it to the forms <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/al#Catalan" title="al">al</a></i> and <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/als#Catalan" title="als">als</a></i> respectively. If <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca">el</i> would be elided to the form <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/l%27#Catalan" title="l&#39;">l’</a></i> because it is before a word beginning with a vowel, the elision to <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/a#Catalan" title="a">a</a> <a href="/wiki/l%E2%80%99#Catalan" class="mw-redirect" title="l’">l’</a></i> takes precedence over contracting to <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/al#Catalan" title="al">al</a></i>.
</p><p>The same occurs with the <a href="/wiki/salat" title="salat">salat</a> article <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/es#Catalan" title="es">es</a></i>, to form <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/as#Catalan" title="as">as</a></i> except where <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca">es</i> would be elided to <i class="Latn mention" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/s%E2%80%99#Catalan" class="mw-redirect" title="s’">s’</a></i>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Derived_terms_5">Derived terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=109" title="Edit section: Derived terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/al#Catalan" title="al">al</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/als#Catalan" title="als">als</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/wiki/as#Catalan" title="as">as</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/w/index.php?title=cap_a&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="cap a (page does not exist)">cap a</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ca"><a href="/w/index.php?title=per_a&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="per a (page does not exist)">per a</a></span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Chuukese">Chuukese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=110" title="Edit section: Chuukese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_17">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=111" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chuukese_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Chuukese phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑ/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_3">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=112" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="chk">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/he#English" title="he">he</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/she#English" title="she">she</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/it#English" title="it">it</a></span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective_2">Adjective</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=113" title="Edit section: Adjective">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="chk">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>he <a href="/wiki/is" title="is">is</a></li>
<li>she is</li>
<li>it is</li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Cornish">Cornish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=115" title="Edit section: Cornish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_18">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=116" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Cornish_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Cornish pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_3">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=117" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="kw">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>Marks the following verb to the preceding subject.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_5">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=118" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="kw">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/of#English" title="of">of</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">Expresses separation, origin, composition/substance or a quality</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/of#English" title="of">of</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">Comes between a preceding large number and a following plural noun to express quantity</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/from#English" title="from">from</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">Indicates provenance</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Inflection">Inflection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=119" title="Edit section: Inflection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="NavFrame" style="clear:both">
<div class="NavHead" align="left">&#160;&#160;Standard Cornish</div>
<div class="NavContent" align="left">
<table class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width: 340px; height: 100px;">

</th>

<td>ahanan

<td>ahanowgh

<td>anodhans, anedha
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Czech">Czech</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=120" title="Edit section: Czech">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_12">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=121" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etylcleanup"><span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/a" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/a">*a</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_19">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=122" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
