<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Dalmatian">Dalmatian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=124" title="Edit section: Dalmatian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_13">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=125" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Danish">Danish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=127" title="Edit section: Danish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_5">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=128" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_20">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=129" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Danish_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Danish pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/æː/</span>, <span class="IPA">[ˈæːˀ]</span></li>
<li>Rhymes: <a href="/wiki/Rhymes:Danish/%C3%A6%CB%90" class="mw-redirect" title="Rhymes:Danish/æː"><span class="IPA">-æː</span></a></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (Copenhagen)</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_7" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.4585625" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="da-cph-a-letter.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/cb/Da-cph-a-letter.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (118 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="118195" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/c/cb/Da-cph-a-letter.ogg/Da-cph-a-letter.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:da-cph-a-letter.ogg" title="File:da-cph-a-letter.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_5">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=130" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="da">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/A#Danish" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Danish <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_5">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=132" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_21">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=133" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_5">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=134" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="da">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> (<i>singular definite</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-da def&#124;s-form-of" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/a%27et#Danish" title="a&#39;et">a'et</a></b>, <i>plural indefinite</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-da indef&#124;p-form-of" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/a%27er#Danish" title="a&#39;er">a'er</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the letter <i class="Latn mention" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/A#Danish" title="A">A</a></i> or <i class="Latn mention" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/a#Danish" title="a">a</a></i>.</span></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=142" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="da">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#imperative_mood" title="Appendix:Glossary">imperative</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/ae#Danish" title="ae">ae</a></i></span></span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Dutch">Dutch</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=143" title="Edit section: Dutch">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_24">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=144" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Dutch_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Dutch pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_11" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.8" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Nl-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7c/Nl-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (111 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="111310" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/7/7c/Nl-a.ogg/Nl-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="144864" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Nl-a.ogg" title="File:Nl-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_6">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=145" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_6">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=146" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nl">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/A#Dutch" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Dutch <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_8">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=147" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latin script letters</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/letter#Dutch" title="letter">letter</a></b>; <a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a><a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/B" title="B">B</a><a href="/wiki/b" title="b">b</a>, <a href="/wiki/C" title="C">C</a><a href="/wiki/c" title="c">c</a>, <a href="/wiki/D" title="D">D</a><a href="/wiki/d" title="d">d</a>, <a href="/wiki/E" title="E">E</a><a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/F" title="F">F</a><a href="/wiki/f" title="f">f</a>, <a href="/wiki/G" title="G">G</a><a href="/wiki/g" title="g">g</a>, <a href="/wiki/H" title="H">H</a><a href="/wiki/h" title="h">h</a>, <a href="/wiki/I" title="I">I</a><a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/J" title="J">J</a><a href="/wiki/j" title="j">j</a>, <a href="/wiki/K" title="K">K</a><a href="/wiki/k" title="k">k</a>, <a href="/wiki/L" title="L">L</a><a href="/wiki/l" title="l">l</a>, <a href="/wiki/M" title="M">M</a><a href="/wiki/m" title="m">m</a>, <a href="/wiki/N" title="N">N</a><a href="/wiki/n" title="n">n</a>, <a href="/wiki/O" title="O">O</a><a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/P" title="P">P</a><a href="/wiki/p" title="p">p</a>, <a href="/wiki/Q" title="Q">Q</a><a href="/wiki/q" title="q">q</a>, <a href="/wiki/R" title="R">R</a><a href="/wiki/r" title="r">r</a>, <a href="/wiki/S" title="S">S</a><a href="/wiki/s" title="s">s</a>, <a href="/wiki/T" title="T">T</a><a href="/wiki/t" title="t">t</a>, <a href="/wiki/U" title="U">U</a><a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/V" title="V">V</a><a href="/wiki/v" title="v">v</a>, <a href="/wiki/W" title="W">W</a><a href="/wiki/w" title="w">w</a>, <a href="/wiki/X" title="X">X</a><a href="/wiki/x" title="x">x</a>, <a href="/wiki/Y" title="Y">Y</a><a href="/wiki/y" title="y">y</a>, <a href="/wiki/Z" title="Z">Z</a><a href="/wiki/z" title="z">z</a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_6">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=148" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">Dutch <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nl:Aa_(waternaam)" class="extiw" title="w:nl:Aa (waternaam)">Aa (waternaam)</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nl:Aa_(waternaam)" class="extiw" title="w:nl:Aa (waternaam)">Wikipedia <sup>nl</sup></a></span></div>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_Dutch" class="extiw" title="w:Middle Dutch">Middle Dutch</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="dum"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_Dutch" title="a">â</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Dutch" class="extiw" title="w:Old Dutch">Old Dutch</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="odt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Dutch" title="a">ā</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahw%C5%8D" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahwō">*ahwō</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_7">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=149" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/aa#Dutch" title="aa">aa</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">especially in names</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/ie#Dutch" title="ie">ie</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_6">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=150" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nl">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-nl p-form-of" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/a%27s#Dutch" title="a&#39;s">a's</a></b>, <i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#diminutive" title="Appendix:Glossary">diminutive</a></i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-nl diminutive-form-of" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/aatje#Dutch" title="aatje">aatje</a></b>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> a <a href="/wiki/stream" title="stream">stream</a> or <a href="/wiki/water" title="water">water</a></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_2">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=151" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/eiland#Dutch" title="eiland">eiland</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_4">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=152" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_Dutch" class="extiw" title="w:Middle Dutch">Middle Dutch</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="dum"><a href="/wiki/jou#Middle_Dutch" title="jou">jou</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Dutch" class="extiw" title="w:Old Dutch">Old Dutch</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="odt"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Old_Dutch/ju&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Old Dutch/ju (page does not exist)">*jū</a></i>, a northern (Frisian?) variant of <i class="Latn mention" lang="odt"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Old_Dutch/iu&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Old Dutch/iu (page does not exist)">*iu</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/iwwiz&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/iwwiz (page does not exist)">*iwwiz</a></i>, a West Germanic variant of <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/izwiz" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/izwiz">*izwiz</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#doublet" title="Appendix:Glossary">Doublet</a> of <i class="Latn mention" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/u#Dutch" title="u">u</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_4">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=153" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Emilian">Emilian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=157" title="Edit section: Emilian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_14">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=158" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ego#Latin" title="ego">ego</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">I</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_25">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=159" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Emilian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Emilian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɐ/</span></li>
<li>Hyphenation: <span class="Latn" lang="egl">a</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_5">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=160" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="egl">a</strong> (<i>personal, nominative case</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/I" title="I">I</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/we" title="we">we</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/you" title="you">you</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">plural</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_8">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=161" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Becomes <i class="Latn mention" lang="egl"><a href="/wiki/aj-#Emilian" title="aj-">aj-</a></i> before a vowel <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">proclitic</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>.</li>
<li>Becomes <i class="Latn mention" lang="egl"><a href="/wiki/-ja#Emilian" title="-ja">-ja</a></i> when acting as an enclitic.</li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Esperanto">Esperanto</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=163" title="Edit section: Esperanto">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_26">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=164" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Esperanto_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Esperanto pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">phoneme</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Esperanto_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Esperanto pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_12" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.79605442176871" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Eo-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e7/Eo-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (96 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="96345" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/e/e7/Eo-a.ogg/Eo-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="125200" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Eo-a.ogg" title="File:Eo-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_7">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=165" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="eo">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="eo"><a href="/wiki/A#Esperanto" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Esperanto <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_9">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=166" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latin script letters</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/litero" title="litero">litero</a></b>; <a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a><a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/B" title="B">B</a><a <h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_7">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=167" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="eo">a</strong> (<i>accusative singular</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-eo acc&#124;s-form-of" lang="eo"><a href="/wiki/a-on#Esperanto" title="a-on">a-on</a></b>, <i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-eo p-form-of" lang="eo"><a href="/wiki/a-oj#Esperanto" title="a-oj">a-oj</a></b>, <i>accusative plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-eo acc&#124;p-form-of" lang="eo"><a href="/wiki/a-ojn#Esperanto" title="a-ojn">a-ojn</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a> letter <b><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></b>/<b><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></b>.</span></li></ol>

<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latin script letter names</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/litero" title="litero">litero</a></b>; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/bo" title="bo">bo</a>, <a href="/wiki/co" title="co">co</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%89o" title="ĉo">ĉo</a>, <a href="/wiki/do" title="do">do</a>, <a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/fo" title="fo">fo</a>, <a href="/wiki/go" title="go">go</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%9Do" title="ĝo">ĝo</a>, <a href="/wiki/ho" title="ho">ho</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%A5o" title="ĥo">ĥo</a>, <a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/jo" title="jo">jo</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%B5o" title="ĵo">ĵo</a>, <a href="/wiki/ko" title="ko">ko</a>, <a href="/wiki/lo" title="lo">lo</a>, <a href="/wiki/mo" title="mo">mo</a>, <a href="/wiki/no" title="no">no</a>, <a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/po" title="po">po</a>, <a href="/wiki/ro" title="ro">ro</a>, <a href="/wiki/so" title="so">so</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C5%9Do" title="ŝo">ŝo</a>, <a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>, <a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C5%ADo" title="ŭo">ŭo</a>, <a href="/wiki/vo" title="vo">vo</a>, <a href="/wiki/zo" title="zo">zo</a> <sup>(Category: <a href="/wiki/Category:eo:Latin_letter_names" title="Category:eo:Latin letter names">eo:Latin letter names</a>)</sup></li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Estonian">Estonian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=169" title="Edit section: Estonian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">Estonian <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="et"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/et:a" class="extiw" title="w:et:a">a</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/et:a" class="extiw" title="w:et:a">Wikipedia <sup>et</sup></a></span></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_27">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=170" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estonian_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Estonian phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ˈɑː/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_8">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=171" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="et">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="et"><a href="/wiki/A#Estonian" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Estonian <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i><a href="/wiki/aa#Estonian" title="aa">aa</a></i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_8">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=172" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="et">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Abbreviation of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="et"><a href="/wiki/aasta#Estonian" title="aasta">aasta</a></i></span></span>; <a href="/wiki/year" title="year">year</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_2">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=173" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="et">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">colloquial<span class="ib-comma qualifier-comma">,</span> in fast speech</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/but" title="but">but</a></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Fala">Fala</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=175" title="Edit section: Fala">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_7">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=176" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician-Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Galician-Portuguese">Old Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Portuguese" title="á">á</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/illa#Latin" title="illa">illa</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">that</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_5">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=177" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fax">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fax"><a href="/wiki/as#Fala" title="as">as</a></b>, <i>masculine</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fax"><a href="/wiki/o#Fala" title="o">o</a></b>, <i>masculine plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fax"><a href="/wiki/os#Fala" title="os">os</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">feminine singular of definite article <span class="Latn" lang="fax"><a href="/wiki/o#Fala" title="o">o</a></span></span>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2000</b>,  Domingo Frades Gaspar,  <cite>Vamus a falal: Notas pâ coñocel y platical en nosa fala</cite>, Editora regional da Extremadura, Chapter 1: Lengua Española:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="fax"><b>A</b> grandeda da lengua española é indiscotibli, i sei estudio, utilización defensa debin sel algo consostancial a nos, <span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation"><b>The</b> greatness of the Spanish language is unquestionable, and its study, use and defense must be something consubstantial to us, <span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_7">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=178" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician-Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Galician-Portuguese">Old Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near, at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_8">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=179" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fax">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2000</b>,  Domingo Frades Gaspar,  <cite>Vamus a falal: Notas pâ coñocel y platical en nosa fala</cite>, Editora regional da Extremadura, Chapter 1: Lengua Española:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="fax">A grandeda da lengua española é indiscotibli, i sei estudio, utilización defensa debin sel algo consostancial <b>a</b> nos, <span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">The greatness of the Spanish language is unquestionable, and its study, use and defense must be something consubstantial <b>to</b> us, <span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Faroese">Faroese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=180" title="Edit section: Faroese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_15">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=181" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/a#Latin" title="a">a</a></i>, form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Etruscan_language" class="extiw" title="w:Etruscan language">Etruscan</a></span> <i class="Ital mention" lang="ett"><a href="/wiki/%F0%90%8C%80#Etruscan" title="𐌀">𐌀</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ett-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%CE%91#Ancient_Greek" title="Α">Α</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">A</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">alpha</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenician_language" class="extiw" title="w:Phoenician language">Phoenician</a></span> <i class="Phnx mention" lang="phn"><a href="/wiki/%F0%90%A4%80#Phoenician" title="𐤀">𐤀</a></i>&#8206; <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="phn-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ʾ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">aleph</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egyptian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Egyptian language">Egyptian</a></span> <i class="Egyp mention" lang="egy"><a href="/wiki/%F0%93%83%BE#Egyptian" title="𓃾">𓃾</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_28">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=182" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Faroese_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Faroese pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɛaː/</span></li>
<li><span class="homophones"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#homophone" title="Appendix:Glossary">Homophone</a>: <span class="Latn" lang="fo"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A6#Faroese" title="æ">æ</a></span></span></li>
<li>Rhymes: <a href="/wiki/Rhymes:Faroese/%C9%9Ba%CB%90" title="Rhymes:Faroese/ɛaː"><span class="IPA">-ɛaː</span></a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_9">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=183" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fo">a</strong> (<i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fo"><a href="/wiki/A#Faroese" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Faroese <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Finnish">Finnish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=185" title="Edit section: Finnish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_10">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=186" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fi">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fi"><a href="/wiki/A#Finnish" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Finnish <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i><a href="/wiki/aa#Finnish" title="aa">aa</a></i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_9">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=188" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fi">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/music" title="music">music</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">note</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_7">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=189" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Capitalized for the great octave or any octave below that, or in names of major keys; not capitalized for the small octave or any octave above that, or in names of minor keys.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Declension">Declension</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=190" title="Edit section: Declension">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<td><div class="NavFrame">

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="French">French</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=191" title="Edit section: French">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_8">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=192" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_29">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=193" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:French_pronunciation" title="Appendix:French pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑ/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_11">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=194" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fr">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/A#French" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the French <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<p><span id="attentionseekingfr" class="attentionseeking" lang="fr" title="Is this just a letter of the French alphabet or is it also the name of the letter in French in which case Category:fr:Latin letter names should be added?"></span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_10">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=195" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fr">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> or <abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-fr p-form-of" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/as#French" title="as">as</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin-script</a> letter <span class="mention"><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></span></span>.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_8">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=196" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Quebec eye-dialect spelling of <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/elle#French" title="elle">elle</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_30">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=197" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canadian_English" class="extiw" title="w:Canadian English">Canada</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:French_pronunciation" title="Appendix:French pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_6">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=198" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fr">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="gender incomplete">?</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">Quebec<span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#colloquial" title="Appendix:Glossary">colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">alternative form of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/elle#French" title="elle">elle</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">she</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>
<dl><dd><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: #777777;">(Can we add an <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:Example_sentences" title="Wiktionary:Example sentences">example</a> for this sense?)</span></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_5">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=199" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Symbol_7">Symbol</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=200" title="Edit section: Symbol">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fr">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/are#Noun" title="are">are</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">100 square metres</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_4">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=201" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_31">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=202" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">France</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:French_pronunciation" title="Appendix:French pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canadian_English" class="extiw" title="w:Canadian English">Canada</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:French_pronunciation" title="Appendix:French pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ɔ/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_3">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=203" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fr">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#third_person" title="Appendix:Glossary">third-person</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#singular_number" title="Appendix:Glossary">singular</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#present_tense" title="Appendix:Glossary">present</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#indicative_mood" title="Appendix:Glossary">indicative</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/avoir#French" title="avoir">avoir</a></i></span></span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="fr">Elle <b>a</b> un chat.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">She <b>has</b> a cat.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Fula">Fula</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=206" title="Edit section: Fula">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_9">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=207" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_12">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=208" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ff">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="ff"><a href="/wiki/A#Fula" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Fula <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_8">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=209" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>Common to all varieties of <a href="/wiki/Fula" title="Fula">Fula</a> (<a href="/wiki/Fulfulde" title="Fulfulde">Fulfulde</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pulaar" title="Pulaar">Pulaar</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pular" title="Pular">Pular</a>).</li></ul>

href="/wiki/T#Fula" title="T">T</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/t#Fula" title="t">t</a>, <a href="/wiki/U#Fula" title="U">U</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/u#Fula" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/W#Fula" title="W">W</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/w#Fula" title="w">w</a>, <a href="/wiki/Y#Fula" title="Y">Y</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/y#Fula" title="y">y</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C6%B3#Fula" title="Ƴ">Ƴ</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/%C6%B4#Fula" title="ƴ">ƴ</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_9">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=211" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_7">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=212" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ff">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/you" title="you">you</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">second person singular subject pronoun; short form</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_9">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=213" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>Common to all varieties of <a href="/wiki/Fula" title="Fula">Fula</a> (<a href="/wiki/Fulfulde" title="Fulfulde">Fulfulde</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pulaar" title="Pulaar">Pulaar</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pular" title="Pular">Pular</a>).</li>
<li>Used in all conjugations except the affirmative non-accomplished, where the long form is used instead.</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_16">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=214" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ff"><a href="/wiki/a%C9%97a#Fula" title="aɗa">aɗa</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">second person singular subject pronoun; long form</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, <span class="Latn" lang="ff"><a href="/wiki/hi%C9%97a#Fula" title="hiɗa">hiɗa</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">variant used in the Pular dialect of Futa Jalon</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ff"><a href="/wiki/aan#Fula" title="aan">aan</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">emphatic form</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Galician">Galician</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=215" title="Edit section: Galician">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_10">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=216" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to, toward</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_32">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=217" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Galician phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a̝/</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_9">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=218" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="gl">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>, <a href="/wiki/toward" title="toward">toward</a>; <span class="use-with-mention">indicating direction of motion</span></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">introduces <a href="/wiki/indirect_object#English" title="indirect object">indirect object</a></span></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">used to indicate <a href="/wiki/time#English" title="time">time</a> of an action</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">with <a href="/wiki/de" title="de">de</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>, <a href="/wiki/until" title="until">until</a>; <span class="use-with-mention">used to indicate the end of a <a href="/wiki/range#English" title="range">range</a></span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="gl">de cinco <b>a</b> oito</i> ― <span class="e-translation">from five <b>to</b> eight</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/by" title="by">by</a>, <a href="/wiki/on" title="on">on</a>, by means of; <span class="use-with-mention">expresses a mode of action</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="gl"><b>a</b> pé</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>on</b> foot</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/for" title="for">for</a>; <span class="use-with-mention">indicates <a href="/wiki/price#English" title="price">price</a> or <a href="/wiki/cost#English" title="cost">cost</a></span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_10">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=219" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>The preposition <i>a</i> regularly forms contractions when it precedes the definite article <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/o#Galician" title="o">o</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/a#Galician" title="a">a</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/os#Galician" title="os">os</a></i>, and <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/as#Galician" title="as">as</a></i>. For example, <i>a o</i> ("to the") contracts to <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/ao#Galician" title="ao">ao</a></i> or <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%B3#Galician" title="ó">ó</a></i>, and <i>a a</i> ("to the") contracts to <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Galician" title="á">á</a></i>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Derived_terms_6">Derived terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=220" title="Edit section: Derived terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Galician" title="á">á</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1s#Galician" title="ás">ás</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/ao#Galician" title="ao">ao</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/aos#Galician" title="aos">aos</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%B3#Galician" title="ó">ó</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%B3s#Galician" title="ós">ós</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_10">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=221" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician-Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Galician-Portuguese">Old Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/illa#Latin" title="illa">illa</a></i>, feminine of <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ille#Latin" title="ille">ille</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">that</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_33">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=222" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Galician phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a̝/</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_6">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=223" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="gl">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i>masculine singular</i> <b class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/o#Galician" title="o">o</a></b>, <i>feminine plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/as#Galician" title="as">as</a></b>, <i>masculine plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/os#Galician" title="os">os</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">definite</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/the" title="the">the</a></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_11">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=224" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>The definite article <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/o#Galician" title="o">o</a></i> (in all its forms) regularly forms contractions when it follows the prepositions <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/a#Galician" title="a">a</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/con#Galician" title="con">con</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">with</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/de#Galician" title="de">de</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">of, from</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/en#Galician" title="en">en</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">in</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. For example, <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl">con a</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">with the</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> contracts to <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/coa#Galician" title="coa">coa</a></i>, and <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl">en a</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">in the</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> contracts to <i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/na#Galician" title="na">na</a></i>.
</p><p>Also, the definite article presents a second form that could be represented as &lt;-lo/-la/-los/-las&gt;, or either lack any specific representation. Its origin is in the assimilation of the last consonant of words ended in -s or -r, due to <a href="/wiki/sandhi" title="sandhi">sandhi</a>, with the /l/ present in the article in pre-Galician-Portuguese period. So <i>Vou comer o caldo</i> or <i>Vou come-lo caldo</i> are representations of <span class="IPA">/ˈβowˈkomelo̝ˈkaldo̝/</span> ("I'm going to have my soup"). This phenomenon, rare in Portuguese, is already documented in 13th century Medieval Galician texts, as the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cantigas_de_Santa_Maria" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Cantigas de Santa Maria">Cantigas de Santa Maria</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Derived_terms_7">Derived terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=225" title="Edit section: Derived terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="list-switcher" data-toggle-category="derived terms"><div class="derivedterms term-list ul-column-count" data-column-count="3" style="background-color: #F8F8FF;">
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Galician" title="á">á</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/coa#Galician" title="coa">coa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/da#Galician" title="da">da</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/na#Galician" title="na">na</a></span></li></ul></div><div class="list-switcher-element" data-showtext="&#160;show more ▼&#160;" data-hidetext="&#160;show less ▲&#160;" style="display: none;">&#160;</div></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_6">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=226" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_34">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=227" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Galician phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ˈa/</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_11">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=228" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="gl">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-gl p-form-of" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/as#Galician" title="as">as</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">name of the letter A, a</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_5">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=229" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>See the etymology of the main entry.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_8">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=230" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="gl">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#accusative_case" title="Appendix:Glossary">accusative</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/ela#Galician" title="ela">ela</a></i></span></span></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="German">German</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=232" title="Edit section: German">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_11">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=233" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_35">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=234" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:German_pronunciation" title="Appendix:German pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ä/</span></li>
<li>Rhymes: <a href="/wiki/Rhymes:German/a%CB%90" title="Rhymes:German/aː"><span class="IPA">-aː</span></a></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_13">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=235" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="de">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/A#German" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the German <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_12">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=236" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="de">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-de gen&#124;s-form-of" lang="de"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-de gen&#124;s-form-of" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/as#German" title="as">as</a></b>, <i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-de p-form-of" lang="de"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-de p-form-of" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/as#German" title="as">as</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Alternative form of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/A#German" title="A">A</a></i></span></span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Declension_2">Declension</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=237" title="Edit section: Declension">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
