<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_12">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=238" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p>The genitive and plural forms <i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/as#German" title="as">as</a></i> are colloquial.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_11">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=239" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_13">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=240" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="de">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Abbreviation of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/a-Moll#German" title="a-Moll">a-Moll</a></i></span></span>.</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Abbreviation of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/Ar#German" title="Ar">Ar</a></i></span></span>.</li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Gilbertese">Gilbertese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=241" title="Edit section: Gilbertese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_16">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=242" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Oceanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Oceanic language">Proto-Oceanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="poz-oce-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Oceanic/pat" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Oceanic/pat">*pat</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central%E2%80%93Eastern_Malayo-Polynesian_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Central–Eastern Malayo-Polynesian languages">Proto-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="pqe-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Eastern_Malayo-Polynesian/pat" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian/pat">*pat</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Malayo-Polynesian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Malayo-Polynesian language">Proto-Malayo-Polynesian</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="poz-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Malayo-Polynesian/%C9%99pat" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Malayo-Polynesian/əpat">*əpat</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Austronesian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Austronesian language">Proto-Austronesian</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="map-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Austronesian/S%C9%99pat" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Austronesian/Səpat">*Səpat</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_36">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=243" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gilbertese_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Gilbertese phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral_2">Numeral</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=244" title="Edit section: Numeral">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Haitian_Creole">Haitian Creole</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=250" title="Edit section: Haitian Creole">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_37">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=251" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haitian_Creole_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Haitian Creole phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_7">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=252" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ht">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/the" title="the">the</a>: <span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/definite_article#English" title="definite article">definite article</a></span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_13">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=253" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>This term only follows words that end with an <a href="/wiki/oral" title="oral">oral</a> (non-<a href="/wiki/nasal" title="nasal">nasal</a>) <a href="/wiki/consonant" title="consonant">consonant</a> and an oral <a href="/wiki/vowel" title="vowel">vowel</a> in that order, and can only modify <a href="/wiki/singular" title="singular">singular</a> nouns.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_17">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=254" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/an#Haitian_Creole" title="an">an</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/la#Haitian_Creole" title="la">la</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/lan#Haitian_Creole" title="lan">lan</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/nan#Haitian_Creole" title="nan">nan</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/yo#Haitian_Creole" title="yo">yo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="ht"><a href="/wiki/yon#Haitian_Creole" title="yon">yon</a></span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Hawaiian">Hawaiian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=255" title="Edit section: Hawaiian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_38">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=256" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hawaiian_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Hawaiian phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_3">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=257" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="haw">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">used between sentences</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/until" title="until">until</a>, <a href="/wiki/up_to" title="up to">up to</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_10">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=258" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="haw">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a>, <a href="/wiki/belonging" title="belonging">belonging</a> to</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_14">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=259" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Used for acquired possessions, while <i class="Latn mention" lang="haw"><a href="/wiki/o#Hawaiian" title="o">o</a></i> is used for possessions that are inherited, out of personal control, and for things that can be got into (houses, clothes, cars).</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Hungarian">Hungarian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=260" title="Edit section: Hungarian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_39">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=261" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Hungarian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Hungarian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">[ˈɒ]</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_13" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.59210884353741" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Hu-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/45/Hu-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (127 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="126693" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/4/45/Hu-a.ogg/Hu-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="132320" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Hu-a.ogg" title="File:Hu-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_8">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=262" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="hu">a</strong> (<i>definite</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/the" title="the">the</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu"><b>a</b> hölgy</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>the</b> lady</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">before some time phrases</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/this" title="this">this</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu"><b>a</b> héten</i> ― <span class="e-translation">(during) <b>this</b> week</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_15">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=263" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Used before words starting with a consonant.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_4">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=264" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="hu"><a href="/wiki/az#Hungarian" title="az">az</a></span>, for words starting with a vowel</li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_10">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=265" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="hu">a</strong> (<i>demonstrative</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">rare<span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;except before postpositions</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu"><b>A</b> mellett a ház mellett vártam rá.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I waited for him/her next to <b>that</b> house.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=266" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="hu">a</strong> (<i>demonstrative</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">very&#32;rare<span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;only in some fixed phrases beginning with a consonant<span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;as a counterpart of <a href="/wiki/az#Determiner" title="az">az</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;followed by no article</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu">Foglalja össze, miről szóltak az <b>a</b> heti beszédek és leckék.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Summarize what <b>that</b> week's sermons and lessons were about.</span></div><sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-6">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu">Meg nem erősített hírek szerint november 12-én, az <b>a</b> havi frissítőkedden jelenhet meg.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">According to unconfirmed reports, it may be released on November 12th, on the Patch Tuesday of <b>that</b> month.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="hu">Kérjük szíves tájékoztatásukat <b>a</b> tekintetben, hogy…</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">equivalent to <i>ab<b>ban a</b> tekintetben,</i> see <a href="/wiki/az#Determiner" title="az">az</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <span class="e-translation">We kindly request your information in <b>that</b> aspect what…</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="References_4">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=267" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-6"><a href="#cite_ref-6"> ^ </a> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.e-nyelv.hu/2011-10-20/a-heti/">a heti</a> at e-nyelv.hu</span>
</li>
</ol></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading_4">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=268" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://nagyszotar.nytud.hu/dictsearch.html?query=a">a</a> in Ittzés, Nóra (ed.). <i>A magyar nyelv nagyszótára</i> (’A Comprehensive Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 2006–2031</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">definite article; pronoun; determiner</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.arcanum.hu/hu/online-kiadvanyok/Lexikonok-a-magyar-nyelv-ertelmezo-szotara-1BE8B/a-3-1BFBA">a</a>&#x20;in Bárczi, Géza and László Országh: <i>A magyar nyelv értelmező szótára</i> (’The Explanatory Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 1959–1962.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">speech sound; letter; first element; abbreviation</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.arcanum.hu/hu/online-kiadvanyok/Lexikonok-a-magyar-nyelv-ertelmezo-szotara-1BE8B/a-1-1BFB0">a</a>&#x20;in Bárczi, Géza and László Országh: <i>A magyar nyelv értelmező szótára</i> (’The Explanatory Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 1959–1962.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">musical sound</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.arcanum.hu/hu/online-kiadvanyok/Lexikonok-a-magyar-nyelv-ertelmezo-szotara-1BE8B/a-2-1BFB6">a</a>&#x20;in Bárczi, Géza and László Országh: <i>A magyar nyelv értelmező szótára</i> (’The Explanatory Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 1959–1962.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">interjection for displeasure, contradiction, surprise, disappointment, or pity</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.arcanum.hu/hu/online-kiadvanyok/Lexikonok-a-magyar-nyelv-ertelmezo-szotara-1BE8B/a-5-1BFD7">a</a>&#x20;in Bárczi, Géza and László Országh: <i>A magyar nyelv értelmező szótára</i> (’The Explanatory Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 1959–1962.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">[dialectal] interjection for emphasis</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.arcanum.hu/hu/online-kiadvanyok/Lexikonok-a-magyar-nyelv-ertelmezo-szotara-1BE8B/a-4-1BFD0">a</a>&#x20;in Bárczi, Géza and László Országh: <i>A magyar nyelv értelmező szótára</i> (’The Explanatory Dictionary of the Hungarian Language’). Budapest: Akadémiai Kiadó, 1959–1962.</li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Icelandic">Icelandic</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=269" title="Edit section: Icelandic">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_40">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=270" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Icelandic_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Icelandic pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li>
<li>Rhymes: <a href="/wiki/Rhymes:Icelandic/a%CB%90" title="Rhymes:Icelandic/aː"><span class="IPA">-aː</span></a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_14">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=271" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="is">a</strong> (<i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="is"><a href="/wiki/A#Icelandic" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Icelandic <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_14">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=272" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="is">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="gender incomplete">?</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin-script</a> letter <span class="mention"><a href="/wiki/A#Icelandic" title="A">A</a></span></span>.</li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Ido">Ido</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=274" title="Edit section: Ido">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_41">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=275" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">context pronunciation, letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ido_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Ido phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_15">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=276" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="io">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="io"><a href="/wiki/A#Ido" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Ido <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_15">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=278" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="io">a</strong> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="io"><a href="/wiki/a-i#Ido" title="a-i">a-i</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a> letter <b><a href="/wiki/A#English" title="A">A</a></b>/<b><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></b>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_20">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=279" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>(<i>Latin script letter names</i>) <b><span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/litero#Ido" title="litero">litero</a></span></b>;&#32;<span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/a#Ido" title="a">a</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/be#Ido" title="be">be</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ce#Ido" title="ce">ce</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/che#Ido" title="che">che</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ge#Ido" title="ge">ge</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/he#Ido" title="he">he</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/i#Ido" title="i">i</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/je#Ido" title="je">je</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ke#Ido" title="ke">ke</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/le#Ido" title="le">le</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/me#Ido" title="me">me</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ne#Ido" title="ne">ne</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/o#Ido" title="o">o</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/pe#Ido" title="pe">pe</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/que#Ido" title="que">que</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/re#Ido" title="re">re</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/se#Ido" title="se">se</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/she#Ido" title="she">she</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/te#Ido" title="te">te</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/u#Ido" title="u">u</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ve#Ido" title="ve">ve</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/we#Ido" title="we">we</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/xe#Ido" title="xe">xe</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ye#Ido" title="ye">ye</a></span>, <span lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ze#Ido" title="ze">ze</a></span> <sup>(Category: <a href="/wiki/Category:io:Latin_letter_names" title="Category:io:Latin letter names">io:Latin letter names</a>)</sup></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_11">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=280" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="io">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#apocopic" title="Appendix:Glossary">Apocopic</a> form of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="io"><a href="/wiki/ad#Ido" title="ad">ad</a></i></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_5">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=281" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="io"><a href="/wiki/e#Ido" title="e">e</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">and</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="io"><a href="/wiki/o#Ido" title="o">o</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">or</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Indo-Portuguese">Indo-Portuguese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=282" title="Edit section: Indo-Portuguese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_17">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=283" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portuguese_language" class="extiw" title="w:Portuguese language">Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/a#Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_42">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=284" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">Sri Lankan Creole</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indo-Portuguese_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Indo-Portuguese phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_12">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=285" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="idb">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1883</b>,  Hugo Schuchardt,  <cite>Kreolische Studien</cite>, volume 3 (in German):</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="idb"><span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span>, que da-cá su quião que ta pertencê <b>a</b> êll.</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation"><span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span>, to give him his share which belongs <b>to</b> him.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Interlingua">Interlingua</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=286" title="Edit section: Interlingua">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_43">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=287" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interlingua_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Interlingua phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_13">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=288" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ia">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>, <a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>, <a href="/wiki/for" title="for">for</a> (indicating purpose)
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ia">sala <b>a</b> attender</i> ― <span class="e-translation">waiting room</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Inupiaq">Inupiaq</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=290" title="Edit section: Inupiaq">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_44">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=291" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inupiaq_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Inupiaq phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_3">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=292" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ik">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/listen#English" title="listen">listen</a>, <a href="/wiki/hark#English" title="hark">hark</a></span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/oops#English" title="oops">oops</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">used to acknowledge an error</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/oh#English" title="oh">oh</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">used to express surprise</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Irish">Irish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=293" title="Edit section: Irish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_45">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=294" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Irish pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ə/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_12">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=295" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyo (page does not exist)">*esyo</a></i> (the final vowel triggering lenition), feminine <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esy%C4%81s&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyās (page does not exist)">*esyās</a></i> (the final <i>-s</i> triggering h-prothesis), plural <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyom&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyom (page does not exist)">*esyom</a></i> (the final nasal triggering eclipsis), all from the genitive forms of <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A9y" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/éy">*éy</a></i>. Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welsh_language" class="extiw" title="w:Welsh language">Welsh</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cy"><a href="/wiki/ei#Welsh" title="ei">ei</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner_2">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=296" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/his" title="his">his</a>, <a href="/wiki/its" title="its">its</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> athair agus <b>a</b> mháthair</i> ― <span class="e-translation">his father and mother</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Chaill an t-éan <b>a</b> chleití.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">The bird lost its feathers.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/iad#Irish" title="iad">iad</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/iadsan#Irish" title="iadsan">iadsan</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> <sup><small>E</small></sup>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<div style="text-align: left">
<p><sup><small>L</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a> <sup><small>E</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a> <sup><small>H</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#H-prothesis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations"><i>h</i>-prothesis</a>
</p><p><sup>1</sup> Also used as the <a href="/wiki/vocative" title="vocative">vocative</a>
</p>
The <a href="/wiki/reflexive" title="reflexive">reflexive</a> is formed by adding <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/f%C3%A9in#Irish" title="féin">féin</a></i> to the relevant pronoun: e.g. "myself" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">mé féin</i>, "yourselves" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">sibh féin</i>.</div>
</div></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner_3">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=298" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#H-prothesis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations"><i>h</i>-prothesis</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a>, <a href="/wiki/its" title="its">its</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> hathair agus <b>a</b> máthair</i> ― <span class="e-translation">her father and mother</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Bhris an mheaig <b>a</b> heiteog.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">The magpie broke its wing.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<div class="NavFrame">
<div class="NavHead" style="text-align: left"><b>Irish personal pronouns</b></div>
<div class="NavContent">
<table class="wikitable">
<tbody><tr>
<th>Number
</th>
<th>Person (and gender)
</th>
<th><a href="/wiki/conjunctive" title="conjunctive">Conjunctive</a> <br /> (<a href="/wiki/emphatic" title="emphatic">emphatic</a>)
</th>
<th><a href="/wiki/disjunctive" title="disjunctive">Disjunctive</a> <br /> (<a href="/wiki/emphatic" title="emphatic">emphatic</a>)
</th>
<th><a href="/wiki/possessive_determiner" title="possessive determiner">Possessive<br />determiner</a>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<th rowspan="4">Singular</th>
<th>First
</th>
<td colspan="2"><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/m%C3%A9#Irish" title="mé">mé</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/mise#Irish" title="mise">mise</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/mo#Irish" title="mo">mo</a></span> <sup><small>L</small></sup> <br /> <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/m%27#Irish" title="m&#39;">m'</a></span> <i>before vowel sounds</i>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th>Second
</th>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/t%C3%BA#Irish" title="tú">tú</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/tusa#Irish" title="tusa">tusa</a></span>)<sup>1</sup>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/th%C3%BA#Irish" title="thú">thú</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/thusa#Irish" title="thusa">thusa</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/do#Irish" title="do">do</a></span> <sup><small>L</small></sup> <br /> <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/d%27#Irish" title="d&#39;">d'</a></span> <i>before vowel sounds</i>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th>Third masculine
</th>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/s%C3%A9#Irish" title="sé">sé</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/seisean#Irish" title="seisean">seisean</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A9#Irish" title="é">é</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/eisean#Irish" title="eisean">eisean</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> <sup><small>L</small></sup>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th>Third feminine
</th>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/s%C3%AD#Irish" title="sí">sí</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/sise#Irish" title="sise">sise</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%AD#Irish" title="í">í</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/ise#Irish" title="ise">ise</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> <sup><small>H</small></sup>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th rowspan="3">Plural</th>
<th>First
</th>
<td colspan="2"><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/muid#Irish" title="muid">muid</a></span>,  <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/sinn#Irish" title="sinn">sinn</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/muidne#Irish" title="muidne">muidne</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/muide#Irish" title="muide">muide</a></span>), (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/sinne#Irish" title="sinne">sinne</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1r#Irish" title="ár">ár</a></span> <sup><small>E</small></sup>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th>Second
</th>
<td colspan="2"><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/sibh#Irish" title="sibh">sibh</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/sibhse#Irish" title="sibhse">sibhse</a></span>)<sup>1</sup>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/bhur#Irish" title="bhur">bhur</a></span> <sup><small>E</small></sup>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<th>Third
</th>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/siad#Irish" title="siad">siad</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/siadsan#Irish" title="siadsan">siadsan</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/iad#Irish" title="iad">iad</a></span> <br /> (<span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/iadsan#Irish" title="iadsan">iadsan</a></span>)
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> <sup><small>E</small></sup>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<div style="text-align: left">
<p><sup><small>L</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a> <sup><small>E</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a> <sup><small>H</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#H-prothesis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations"><i>h</i>-prothesis</a>
</p><p><sup>1</sup> Also used as the <a href="/wiki/vocative" title="vocative">vocative</a>
</p>
The <a href="/wiki/reflexive" title="reflexive">reflexive</a> is formed by adding <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/f%C3%A9in#Irish" title="féin">féin</a></i> to the relevant pronoun: e.g. "myself" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">mé féin</i>, "yourselves" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">sibh féin</i>.</div>
</div></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner_4">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=300" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> (<i>triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/their#English" title="their">their</a></span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> n-athair agus <b>a</b> máthair</i> ― <span class="e-translation">their father and mother</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> dtithe</i> ― <span class="e-translation">their houses</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> n-ainmneacha</i> ― <span class="e-translation">their names</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connacht" class="extiw" title="w:Connacht">Connacht</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/our#English" title="our">our</a></span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connacht" class="extiw" title="w:Connacht">Connacht</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/your#English" title="your">your</a></span>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_23">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=301" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>

<div style="text-align: left">
<p><sup><small>L</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a> <sup><small>E</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a> <sup><small>H</small></sup> Triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#H-prothesis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations"><i>h</i>-prothesis</a>
</p><p><sup>1</sup> Also used as the <a href="/wiki/vocative" title="vocative">vocative</a>
</p>
The <a href="/wiki/reflexive" title="reflexive">reflexive</a> is formed by adding <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/f%C3%A9in#Irish" title="féin">féin</a></i> to the relevant pronoun: e.g. "myself" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">mé féin</i>, "yourselves" = <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">sibh féin</i>.</div>
</div></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner_5">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=302" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/how" title="how">how</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">used with an abstract noun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>A</b> ghéire a labhair sí!</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">How sharply she spoke!</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>A</b> fheabhas atá sé!</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">How good it is!</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_12">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=303" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_11">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=304" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> (<i>triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a> except of <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/d%E2%80%99#Irish" class="mw-redirect" title="d’">d’</a></i> and of past autonomous forms</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Introduces a direct relative clause, takes the independent form of an irregular verb</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an fear <b>a</b> chuireann síol</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the man who sows seed</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an síol <b>a</b> chuireann an fear</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the seed that the man sows</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an síol <b>a</b> cuireadh</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the seed that was sown</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">nuair <b>a</b> bhí mé óg</i> ― <span class="e-translation">when I was young</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an cat <b>a</b> d'ól an bainne</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the cat that drank the milk</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_12">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=305" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> (<i>triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a>, takes the dependent form of an irregular verb; not used in the past tense except with some irregular verbs</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Introduces an indirect relative clause</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an bord <b>a</b> raibh leabhar air</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the table on which there was a book</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an fear <b>a</b> bhfuil a mhac ag imeacht</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the man whose son is going away</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_6">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=306" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/ar#Irish" title="ar">ar</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">used with the past tense of regular and some irregular verbs</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_13">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=307" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> (<i>triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Eclipsis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">eclipsis</a>, takes the dependent form of an irregular verb; not used in the past tense except with some irregular verbs</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/all" title="all">all</a> <a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a>, <a href="/wiki/whatever" title="whatever">whatever</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Sin <b>a</b> bhfuil ann.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">That's all that is there.</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">An bhfuair tú <b>a</b> raibh uait?</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">Did you get all that you wanted?</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Íocfaidh mé as <b>a</b> gceannóidh tú.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">I will pay for whatever you buy.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_7">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=308" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/ar#Irish" title="ar">ar</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">used with the past tense of regular and some irregular verbs</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_7">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=309" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_4">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=310" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Introduces a vocative</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>A</b> Dhia!</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">O God!</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>A</b> dhuine uasail!</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">Sir!</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Tar isteach, <b>a</b> Sheáin.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">Come in, Seán.</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>A</b> amadáin!</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">You fool!</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_6">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=311" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_5">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=312" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#H-prothesis" title="Appendix:Irish mutations"><i>h</i>-prothesis</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Introduces a numeral</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga"><b>a</b> haon, <b>a</b> dó, <b>a</b> trí...</i> ― <span class="e-translation">one, two, three...</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Séamas <b>a</b> Dó</i> ― <span class="e-translation">James the Second</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">bus <b>a</b> seacht</i> ― <span class="e-translation">bus seven</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_3">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=313" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Originally a reduced form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/do#Irish" title="do">do</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_14">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=314" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ga">a</strong> (<i>plus dative</i>, <i>triggers <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Irish_mutations#Lenition" title="Appendix:Irish mutations">lenition</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">used with verbal nouns</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">síol <b>a</b> chur</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to sow seed</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">uisce <b>a</b> ól</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to drink water</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">an rud atá sé <b>a</b> scríobh</i> ― <span class="e-translation">what he is writing</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">D’éirigh sé <b>a</b> chaint.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">He rose to speak.</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ga">Téigh <b>a</b> chodladh.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">Go to sleep.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Mutation">Mutation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=315" title="Edit section: Mutation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/n-a#Irish" title="n-a">n-a</a></span>
</td>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading_5">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=316" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>"<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.teanglann.ie/en/fgb/a">a</a>" in <i>Foclóir Gaeilge-Béarla</i>, An Gúm, 1977, by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Niall_%C3%93_D%C3%B3naill" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Niall Ó Dónaill">Niall Ó Dónaill</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Marstrander" class="extiw" title="w:Carl Marstrander">C. Marstrander</a>, E.&#160;G. Quin et al., editors&#32;(1913–76),&#32;“<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://edil.qub.ac.uk/2">1 a (vocative particle)</a>”, in&#32;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dictionary_of_the_Irish_Language" class="extiw" title="w:Dictionary of the Irish Language">Dictionary of the Irish Language: Based Mainly on Old and Middle Irish Materials</a></cite>, Dublin&#58; Royal Irish Academy, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9780901714299" title="Special:BookSources/9780901714299">→ISBN</a></small></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Marstrander" class="extiw" title="w:Carl Marstrander">C. Marstrander</a>, E.&#160;G. Quin et al., editors&#32;(1913–76),&#32;“<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://edil.qub.ac.uk/3">2 a (‘his, her, their’)</a>”, in&#32;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dictionary_of_the_Irish_Language" class="extiw" title="w:Dictionary of the Irish Language">Dictionary of the Irish Language: Based Mainly on Old and Middle Irish Materials</a></cite>, Dublin&#58; Royal Irish Academy, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9780901714299" title="Special:BookSources/9780901714299">→ISBN</a></small></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Marstrander" class="extiw" title="w:Carl Marstrander">C. Marstrander</a>, E.&#160;G. Quin et al., editors&#32;(1913–76),&#32;“<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://edil.qub.ac.uk/4">3 a (particle used before numerals)</a>”, in&#32;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dictionary_of_the_Irish_Language" class="extiw" title="w:Dictionary of the Irish Language">Dictionary of the Irish Language: Based Mainly on Old and Middle Irish Materials</a></cite>, Dublin&#58; Royal Irish Academy, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9780901714299" title="Special:BookSources/9780901714299">→ISBN</a></small></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Marstrander" class="extiw" title="w:Carl Marstrander">C. Marstrander</a>, E.&#160;G. Quin et al., editors&#32;(1913–76),&#32;“<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://edil.qub.ac.uk/5">4 a (‘that which’)</a>”, in&#32;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dictionary_of_the_Irish_Language" class="extiw" title="w:Dictionary of the Irish Language">Dictionary of the Irish Language: Based Mainly on Old and Middle Irish Materials</a></cite>, Dublin&#58; Royal Irish Academy, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9780901714299" title="Special:BookSources/9780901714299">→ISBN</a></small></li></ul>
