<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Istriot">Istriot</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=317" title="Edit section: Istriot">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_18">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=318" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_15">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=319" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ist">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/at#English" title="at">at</a></span>
<ul><li><b>1877</b>, Antonio Ive, <i>Canti popolari istriani: raccolti a Rovigno</i>, volume 5, Ermanno Loescher, page 99:
<dl><dd><b>A</b> poûpa, a prùa a xì doûto bandere,
<dl><dd><b>At</b> the stern, <b>at</b> the bow everything is flags,</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_6">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=320" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ist">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">emphasises a verb; mandatory with impersonal verbs</span>
<ul><li><b>1877</b>, Antonio Ive, <i>Canti popolari istriani: raccolti a Rovigno</i>, volume 5, Ermanno Loescher, page 99:
<dl><dd>A poûpa, a prùa <b>a</b> xì doûto bandere,
<dl><dd>At the stern, at the bow everything is flags,</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Italian">Italian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=321" title="Edit section: Italian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_46">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=322" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Italian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Italian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>, <span class="IPA">[ä]</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_14" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="1.6718367346939" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="It-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/45/It-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (103 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="103197" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/4/45/It-a.ogg/It-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="133920" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:It-a.ogg" title="File:It-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li>
<li>Hyphenation: <span class="Latn" lang="it">a</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_13">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=323" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/a#Latin" title="a">ā</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="ann-pos"><i>the name of the letter</i> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></i></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_16">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=324" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="it">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#invariable" title="Appendix:Glossary">invariable</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin-script</a> letter <span class="mention"><a href="/wiki/A#Italian" title="A">A</a></span></span>.; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a#English" title="a">a</a></span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_24">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=325" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Latin-script letter names</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <b class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/lettera#Italian" title="lettera">lettera</a></b>; <strong class="selflink">a</strong>, <a href="/wiki/bi#Italian" title="bi">bi</a>, <a href="/wiki/ci#Italian" title="ci">ci</a>, <a href="/wiki/di#Italian" title="di">di</a>, <a href="/wiki/e#Italian" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/effe#Italian" title="effe">effe</a>, <a href="/wiki/gi#Italian" title="gi">gi</a>, <a href="/wiki/acca#Italian" title="acca">acca</a>, <a href="/wiki/i#Italian" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/i_lunga#Italian" title="i lunga">i lunga</a>, <a href="/wiki/kappa#Italian" title="kappa">kappa</a>, <a href="/wiki/elle#Italian" title="elle">elle</a>, <a href="/wiki/emme#Italian" title="emme">emme</a>, <a href="/wiki/enne#Italian" title="enne">enne</a>, <a href="/wiki/o#Italian" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/pi#Italian" title="pi">pi</a>, <a href="/wiki/cu#Italian" title="cu">cu</a>, <a href="/wiki/erre#Italian" title="erre">erre</a>, <a href="/wiki/esse#Italian" title="esse">esse</a>, <a href="/wiki/ti#Italian" title="ti">ti</a>, <a href="/wiki/u#Italian" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/vu#Italian" title="vu">vu</a>, <a href="/wiki/doppia_vu#Italian" title="doppia vu">doppia vu</a>, <a href="/wiki/ics#Italian" title="ics">ics</a>, <a href="/wiki/ipsilon#Italian" title="ipsilon">ipsilon</a>, <a href="/wiki/zeta#Italian" title="zeta">zeta</a></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_13">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=326" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near; at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. In a few phrases, <i>a</i> stems from Latin <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/a#Latin" title="a">a</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ab#Latin" title="ab">ab</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-7">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_16">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=327" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><span id="italian-preposition"></span>
<strong class="Latn headword" lang="it">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/in" title="in">in</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a></li>
<li><i>Indicates the direct object, mainly to avoid confusion when it, the subject, or both are displaced, or for emphasis</i>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="it"><b>A</b> me non importa.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">It doesn’t matter <b>to</b> me.</span></dd><dd>(literally, “<span class="e-literally"><b>To</b> me it doesn’t matter.</span>”)</dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="it"><b>A</b> lei non piace, ma <b>a</b> lui piace molto.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">She doesn't like it, but he likes it very much.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_16">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=328" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>When followed by a word that begins with a vowel sound, the form <i class="Latn mention" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/ad#Italian" title="ad">ad</a></i> is used instead.</li>
<li>When followed by the definite article, <i class="Latn mention" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></i> combines with the article to produce the following combined forms:</li></ul>
<dl><dd><table class="wikitable">

<tbody><tr>
<th><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + article
</th>
<th>Combined form
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/il#Italian" title="il">il</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/al#Italian" title="al">al</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/lo#Italian" title="lo">lo</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/allo#Italian" title="allo">allo</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/l%27#Italian" title="l&#39;">l'</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/all%27#Italian" title="all&#39;">all'</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/i#Italian" title="i">i</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/ai#Italian" title="ai">ai</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/gli#Italian" title="gli">gli</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/agli#Italian" title="agli">agli</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/la#Italian" title="la">la</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/alla#Italian" title="alla">alla</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/le#Italian" title="le">le</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/alle#Italian" title="alle">alle</a></span>
</td></tr></tbody></table></dd></dl>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_8">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=329" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_4">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=330" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="it">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Misspelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="it"><a href="/wiki/ha#Italian" title="ha">ha</a></i></span></span>.</li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Kalasha">Kalasha</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=343" title="Edit section: Kalasha">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_19">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=344" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanskrit" class="extiw" title="w:Sanskrit">Sanskrit</a></span> <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa"><a href="/wiki/%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%8D#Sanskrit" title="अहम्">अहम्</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aham</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A9%C7%B5h%E2%82%82om" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/éǵh₂om">*éǵh₂om</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_15">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=345" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Krisa">Krisa</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=350" title="Edit section: Krisa">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_17">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=352" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Latgalian">Latgalian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=359" title="Edit section: Latgalian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_21">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=360" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Shortened from an older Baltic form <i>*ā</i>, which cognates with Lithuanian <a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a> (the same meaning).
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_50">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=361" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latgalian_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Latgalian phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_4">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=362" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/but" title="but">but</a>, <a href="/wiki/however" title="however">however</a>, <a href="/wiki/while" title="while">while</a>, <a href="/wiki/signal" title="signal">signal</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_7">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=363" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a>, <a href="/wiki/but" title="but">but</a>, <a href="/wiki/so" title="so">so</a>, <a href="/wiki/well" title="well">well</a></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Latin">Latin</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=364" title="Edit section: Latin">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_14">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=365" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%CE%91#Ancient_Greek" title="Α">Α</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">A</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">alpha</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, likely through Etruscan.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_51">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=366" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span>
</p>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classical_Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Classical Latin">Classical</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latin pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_16">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=367" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="la">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">sometimes with <i><a href="/wiki/littera" title="littera">littera</a></i></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> the first letter of the Latin alphabet.
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="la">littera <b>a</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">the letter a</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_14">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=368" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Etruscan_language" class="extiw" title="w:Etruscan language">Etruscan</a></span> <small>[Term?]</small>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_52">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=369" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classical_Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Classical Latin">Classical</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latin pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_18">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=370" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="la">ā</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#indeclinable" title="Appendix:Glossary">indeclinable</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the letter <i><span class="Latn" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></span></i>.</span></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Coordinate_terms">Coordinate terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=371" title="Edit section: Coordinate terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Latin-script letter names</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <b class="Latn" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/littera#Latin" title="littera">littera</a></b>; <strong class="selflink">ā</strong>, <a href="/wiki/be#Latin" title="be">bē</a>, <a href="/wiki/ce#Latin" title="ce">cē</a>, <a href="/wiki/de#Latin" title="de">dē</a>, <a href="/wiki/e#Latin" title="e">ē</a>, <a href="/wiki/ef#Latin" title="ef">ef</a>, <a href="/wiki/ge#Latin" title="ge">gē</a>, <a href="/wiki/ha#Latin" title="ha">hā</a>, <a href="/wiki/i#Latin" title="i">ī</a>, <a href="/wiki/ka#Latin" title="ka">kā</a>, <a href="/wiki/el#Latin" title="el">el</a>, <a href="/wiki/em#Latin" title="em">em</a>, <a href="/wiki/en#Latin" title="en">en</a>, <a href="/wiki/o#Latin" title="o">ō</a>, <a href="/wiki/pe#Latin" title="pe">pē</a>, <a href="/wiki/ku#Latin" title="ku">kū</a>, <a href="/wiki/er#Latin" title="er">er</a>, <a href="/wiki/es#Latin" title="es">es</a>, <a href="/wiki/te#Latin" title="te">tē</a>, <a href="/wiki/u#Latin" title="u">ū</a>, <a href="/wiki/ix#Latin" title="ix">ix</a> / <a href="/wiki/ix#Latin" title="ix">īx</a> / <a href="/wiki/ex#Latin" title="ex">ex</a>, <a href="/wiki/y#Latin" title="y">ȳ</a> / <a href="/wiki/i_graeca#Latin" title="i graeca">ī graeca</a> / <a href="/wiki/ypsilon#Latin" title="ypsilon">ȳpsīlon</a>, <a href="/wiki/zeta#Latin" title="zeta">zēta</a></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="References_9">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=372" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Arthur E. Gordon, <i>The Letter Names of the Latin Alphabet</i> (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_California_Press" class="extiw" title="w:University of California Press">University of California Press</a>, 1973; volume 9 of <i>University of California Publications: Classical Studies</i>), part III: “Summary of the Ancient Evidence”, page 32<br /> Clearly there is no question or doubt about the names of the vowels A, E, I, O, U. They are simply long A, long E, etc. (ā, ē, ī, ō, ū). Nor is there any uncertainty with respect to the six mutes B, C, D, G, P, T. Their names are bē, cē, dē, gē, pē, tē (each with a long E). Or about H, K, and Q: they are hā, kā, kū — each, again, with a long vowel sound.</li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_9">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=373" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Shortened form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ab#Latin" title="ab">ab</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_10">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=374" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0#Latin" title="à">à</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">earlier in New Latin</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Latn" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ab#Latin" title="ab">ab</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_53">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=375" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classical_Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Classical Latin">Classical</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latin pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio (Classical)</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_15" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="1.3815873015873" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="la-cls-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/83/La-cls-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (91 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="90771" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/8/83/La-cls-a.ogg/La-cls-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:la-cls-a.ogg" title="File:la-cls-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_18">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=376" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="la">ā</strong> (+ <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#ablative" title="Appendix:Glossary">ablative</a>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a>, <a href="/wiki/from" title="from">from</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heauton_Timorumenos" class="extiw" title="w:Heauton Timorumenos">Heauton Timorumenos</a></i> (“The Self-Tormentor”) by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terence" class="extiw" title="w:Terence">Publius Terentius Afer</a>
<dl><dd><i>Homo sum, humani nihil <b>a</b> me alienum puto.</i>
<dl><dd>I am a man, I consider nothing that is human alien <b>to</b> me.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_54">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=379" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classical_Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Classical Latin">Classical</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latin pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/aː/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_4">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=380" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Latvian">Latvian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=381" title="Edit section: Latvian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">Latvian <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="lv"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/lv:a" class="extiw" title="w:lv:a">a</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/lv:a" class="extiw" title="w:lv:a">Wikipedia <sup>lv</sup></a></span></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_22">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=382" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Proposed in 1908 as part of the new Latvian spelling by the scientific commission headed by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K%C4%81rlis_M%C4%ABlenbahs" class="extiw" title="w:Kārlis Mīlenbahs">K. Mīlenbahs</a>, which was accepted and began to be taught in schools in 1909. Prior to that, Latvian had been written in German <a href="/wiki/Fraktur" title="Fraktur">Fraktur</a>, and sporadically in <a href="/wiki/Cyrillic" title="Cyrillic">Cyrillic</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_55">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=383" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latvian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latvian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">[a]</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_16" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="1.146375" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="lv-riga-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/99/Lv-riga-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (88 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="87811" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/9/99/Lv-riga-a.ogg/Lv-riga-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:lv-riga-a.ogg" title="File:lv-riga-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_17">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=384" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:202px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e4/Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg/200px-Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="200" height="58" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e4/Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg/300px-Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e4/Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg/400px-Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="120" data-file-height="35" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Latin_alphabet_Aa.svg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>A</div></div></div>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="lv">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="lv"><a href="/wiki/A#Latvian" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Latvian <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i><a href="/wiki/a#Latvian" title="a">a</a></i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_26">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=385" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_56">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=386" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latvian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Latvian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">[a]</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_19">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=387" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="lv">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span>&#32;(<i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#invariable" title="Appendix:Glossary">invariable</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The name of the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a> letter <span class="Latn" lang="lv"><a href="/wiki/A#Latvian" title="A">A</a></span>/<span class="Latn" lang="lv"><a href="/wiki/a#Latvian" title="a">a</a></span>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_27">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=388" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latvian letter names</i>) <b><a href="/wiki/burts" title="burts">latviešu burtu vārdi</a></b>; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/garais_%C4%81" title="garais ā">garais ā</a>, <a href="/wiki/b%C4%93" title="bē">bē</a>, <a href="/wiki/c%C4%93" title="cē">cē</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%8D%C4%93" title="čē">čē</a>, <a href="/wiki/d%C4%93" title="dē">dē</a>, <a href="/wiki/e" title="e">e</a>, <a href="/wiki/garais_%C4%93" title="garais ē">garais ē</a>, <a href="/wiki/ef" title="ef">ef</a>, <a href="/wiki/g%C4%81" title="gā">gā</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%A3%C4%93" title="ģē">ģē</a>, <a href="/wiki/h%C4%81" title="hā">hā</a>, <a href="/wiki/i" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/garais_%C4%AB" title="garais ī">garais ī</a>, <a href="/wiki/j%C4%93" title="jē">jē</a>, <a href="/wiki/k%C4%81" title="kā">kā</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%B7%C4%93" title="ķē">ķē</a>, <a href="/wiki/el" title="el">el</a>, <a href="/wiki/e%C4%BC" title="eļ">eļ</a>, <a href="/wiki/em" title="em">em</a>, <a href="/wiki/en" title="en">en</a>, <a href="/wiki/e%C5%86" title="eņ">eņ</a>, <a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/p%C4%93" title="pē">pē</a>, <a href="/wiki/er" title="er">er</a>, <a href="/wiki/es" title="es">es</a>, <a href="/wiki/e%C5%A1" title="eš">eš</a>, <a href="/wiki/t%C4%93" title="tē">tē</a>, <a href="/wiki/u" title="u">u</a>, <a href="/wiki/garais_%C5%AB" title="garais ū">garais ū</a>, <a href="/wiki/v%C4%93" title="vē">vē</a>, <a href="/wiki/z%C4%93" title="zē">zē</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C5%BE%C4%93" title="žē">žē</a></li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Ligurian">Ligurian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=389" title="Edit section: Ligurian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_57">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=390" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ligurian_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Ligurian phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_15">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=391" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<table class="wikitable floatright" style="clear:both; text-align:center; margin-left:10px">

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_9">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=392" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="lij">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr>&#160;<abbr title="singular number">sg</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/e#Ligurian" title="e">e</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/the" title="the">the</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_15">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=393" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near”, “at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_19">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=394" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="lij">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/in" title="in">in</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="lij">Vàddo <b>a</b> câza.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I'm going home.</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally">I go <b>to</b> home.</span>”)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention">Indicates the direct object, mainly to avoid confusion when it, the subject, or both are displaced, or for emphasis</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="lij"><b>A</b> mæ seu ghe fa mâ 'n bràsso.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">My sister's arm hurts.</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally"><b>To</b> my sister an arm hurts.</span>”)</div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<dl><dd><table class="wikitable">

<tbody><tr>
<th><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + article
</th>
<th>Combined form
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/o#Ligurian" title="o">o</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/a-o#Ligurian" title="a-o">a-o</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/a#Ligurian" title="a">a</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/a-a#Ligurian" title="a-a">a-a</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/i#Ligurian" title="i">i</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/a-i#Ligurian" title="a-i">a-i</a></span>
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><strong class="selflink">a</strong></span> + <span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/e#Ligurian" title="e">e</a></span>
</td>
<td><span class="Latn" lang="lij"><a href="/wiki/a-e#Ligurian" title="a-e">a-e</a></span>
</td></tr></tbody></table></dd></dl>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Livonian">Livonian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=395" title="Edit section: Livonian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_58">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=396" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">phoneme</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Livonian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Livonian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑ/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_18">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=397" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="liv">a</strong> (<i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="liv"><a href="/wiki/A#Livonian" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Livonian <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Louisiana_Creole_French">Louisiana Creole French</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=399" title="Edit section: Louisiana Creole French">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_23">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=400" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language">French</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href="/wiki/avoir#French" title="avoir">avoir</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to have</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_59">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=403" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Malay">Malay</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=405" title="Edit section: Malay">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_60">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=406" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Malay_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Malay pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_19">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=407" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ms">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="ms"><a href="/wiki/A#Malay" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Malay <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_29">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=408" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Maltese">Maltese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=409" title="Edit section: Maltese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_20">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=410" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mt">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="mt"><a href="/wiki/A#Maltese" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Maltese <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_30">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=411" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin-script</a> letters</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <b class="Latn" lang="mt"><a href="/wiki/ittra#Maltese" title="ittra">ittra</a></b>; <span class="Latn" lang="mt"><a href="/wiki/A#Maltese" title="A">A</a>&#160;<strong class="selflink">a</strong>, <a href="/wiki/B#Maltese" title="B">B</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/b#Maltese" title="b">b</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C4%8A#Maltese" <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Mandarin">Mandarin</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=412" title="Edit section: Mandarin">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Romanization_4">Romanization</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=413" title="Edit section: Romanization">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="cmn">a</strong> (<i><a href="/wiki/Zhuyin_fuhao" title="Zhuyin fuhao">Zhuyin</a></i> <span class="Bopo" lang="cmn">˙ㄚ</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Pinyin" title="Pinyin">Pinyin</a> transcription of <i class="Hani mention" lang="zh"><a href="/wiki/%E5%91%B5#Chinese" title="呵">呵</a></i></span></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Pinyin" title="Pinyin">Pinyin</a> transcription of <i class="Hani mention" lang="zh"><a href="/wiki/%E5%95%8A#Chinese" title="啊">啊</a></i></span></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Pinyin" title="Pinyin">Pinyin</a> transcription of <i class="Hani mention" lang="zh"><a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF#Chinese" title="阿">阿</a></i></span></li></ol>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="cmn">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Nonstandard spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="cmn"><a href="/wiki/%C4%81#Mandarin" title="ā">ā</a></i></span></span>.</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Nonstandard spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="cmn"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Mandarin" title="á">á</a></i></span></span>.</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Nonstandard spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="cmn"><a href="/wiki/%C7%8E#Mandarin" title="ǎ">ǎ</a></i></span></span>.</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Nonstandard spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="cmn"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0#Mandarin" title="à">à</a></i></span></span>.</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_17">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=414" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>English <a href="/wiki/transcription" title="transcription">transcriptions</a> of Mandarin speech often fail to distinguish between the critical <a href="/wiki/tonal" title="tonal">tonal</a> differences employed in the Mandarin language, using words such as this one without the appropriate indication of tone.</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Mandinka">Mandinka</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=415" title="Edit section: Mandinka">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_17">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=416" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mnk">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/he" title="he">he</a>, <a href="/wiki/him" title="him">him</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">personal pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="mnk">A m busa</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He/she struck me.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="mnk">Y a busa</i> ― <span class="e-translation">They struck him/her.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/she" title="she">she</a>, <a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">personal pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/it" title="it">it</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">personal pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Maori">Maori</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=418" title="Edit section: Maori">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_8">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=419" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="mi">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a></li>
<li><i>(determinative particle for names)</i></li>
<li><i>(particle for pronouns when succeeding <a href="/wiki/ki#Maori" title="ki">ki</a>, <a href="/wiki/i#Maori" title="i">i</a>, <a href="/wiki/kei#Maori" title="kei">kei</a>, and <a href="/wiki/hei#Maori" title="hei">hei</a>)</i></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_18">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=420" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li>When used in the sense of <a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a>, suggests that the possessor has control of the relationship (alienable possession).</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Mezquital_Otomi">Mezquital Otomi</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=421" title="Edit section: Mezquital Otomi">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_16">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=422" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_61">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=423" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mezquital_Otomi_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Mezquital Otomi phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/à/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_5">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=424" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ote">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Expresses satisfaction, pity, fright, or admiration.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_16">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=425" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_11">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=426" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ote"><a href="/wiki/%CA%BCa#Mezquital_Otomi" title="ʼa">ʼa</a></span> (<i>obsolete</i>)</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_62">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=427" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mezquital_Otomi_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Mezquital Otomi phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/à/</span>, <span class="IPA">/ǎ/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_6">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=428" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ote">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#transitive" title="Appendix:Glossary">transitive</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/wake#English" title="wake">wake</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/awaken#English" title="awaken">awaken</a></span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_10">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=429" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Otomi_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Otomi language">Proto-Otomi</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="oto-otm-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Otomi/%CA%94%C9%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Otomi/ʔɔ (page does not exist)">*ʔɔ</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Otomian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Otomian language">Proto-Otomian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="oto-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Otomian/%CA%94%C9%94&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Otomian/ʔɔ (page does not exist)">*ʔɔ</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_12">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=430" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="ote"><a href="/wiki/%CA%BC%C3%A1#Mezquital_Otomi" title="ʼá">ʼá</a></span> (<i>obsolete</i>)</li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_63">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=431" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Middle_Dutch">Middle Dutch</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=435" title="Edit section: Middle Dutch">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_24">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=436" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Dutch" class="extiw" title="w:Old Dutch">Old Dutch</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="odt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Dutch" title="a">ā</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahw%C5%8D" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahwō">*ahwō</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82ek%CA%B7eh%E2%82%82" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂ekʷeh₂">*h₂ekʷeh₂</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_21">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=437" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="dum">â</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">rare</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/river" title="river">river</a>, <a href="/wiki/stream" title="stream">stream</a>, <a href="/wiki/water" title="water">water</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Inflection_3">Inflection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=438" title="Edit section: Inflection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_21">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=463" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="wlm">a</strong> (<i>triggers lenition</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/who" title="who">who</a>, <a href="/wiki/which" title="which">which</a>, <a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_10">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=464" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="wlm">a</strong> (<i>triggers lenition</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">inserted before the verb when the subject of direct object precedes it</span>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/cy:Pwyll_Pendeuic_Dyuet" class="extiw" title="s:cy:Pwyll Pendeuic Dyuet">Pwyll Pendeuic Dyuet</a>:
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="wlm">Pwyll Pendeuic Dyuet <b>a</b> oed yn arglwyd ar seith cantref Dyuet.</span>
<dl><dd><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pwyll" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Pwyll">Pwyll</a> Prince of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kingdom_of_Dyfed" class="extiw" title="w:Kingdom of Dyfed">Dyfed</a> was lord of the seven <a href="/wiki/cantref" title="cantref">cantrefs</a> of Dyfed.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_12">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=465" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_66">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=466" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Middle_Welsh_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Middle Welsh pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_11">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=467" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="wlm">a</strong> (<i>triggers lenition</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">used to introduce a direct question</span></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/whether" title="whether">whether</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">used to introduce an indirect question</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_8">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=468" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Reduction of <i class="Latn mention" lang="wlm"><a href="/wiki/o#Middle_Welsh" title="o">o</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">from</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_67">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=469" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Middle_Welsh_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Middle Welsh pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_21">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=470" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="wlm">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">used between a focused adjective and the noun it modifies</span>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/cy:Pwyll_Pendeuic_Dyuet" class="extiw" title="s:cy:Pwyll Pendeuic Dyuet">Pwyll Pendeuic Dyuet</a>:
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="wlm">bychan <b>a</b> dial oed yn lloski ni, neu yn dienydyaw am y mab</span>
<dl><dd>it will be small vengeance if we are burnt or put to death because of the child</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_4">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=471" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_22">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=478" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/with" title="with">with</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_7_2">Etymology 7</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=479" title="Edit section: Etymology 7">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro">*ageti</i>, third-person singular present indicative of <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/ago-&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/ago- (page does not exist)">*ago-</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82e%C7%B5-" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂eǵ-">*h₂eǵ-</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_16">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=480" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="wlm"><a href="/wiki/aa#Middle_Welsh" title="aa">aa</a></span></li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Nauruan">Nauruan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=491" title="Edit section: Nauruan">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_23">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=493" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="na">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/I" title="I">I</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">first person singular pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2000</b>,  Lisa M Johnson,  <cite>Firstness of Secondness in Nauruan Morphology</cite> (in English):</span><dl><dd></dd></dl></div>
<dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="na"><b>a</b> pudun</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">1sing fall+Vn<br /><b>I</b> fell</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></dd>
<dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="na"><b>a</b> nuwawen</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">1pers.sing. go+Vn<br /><b>I</b> did go. (I left.)</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></dd>
<dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="na"><b>a</b> kaiotien aem</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">[1pers.sing.] [hear+Vn] [your words]<br /><b>I</b> hear what you said.</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><span class="q-hellip-sp">&#32;</span><span class="q-hellip-b">[</span>…<span class="q-hellip-b">]</span><span class="q-hellip-b">&#32;</span></dd>
<dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="na"><b>a</b> nan imoren</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">1pers.sing. FUT health+Vn<br /><b>I</b> shall be cured (get better).</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Navajo">Navajo</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=494" title="Edit section: Navajo">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_21">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=495" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="nv-Latn headword" lang="nv">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="nv-Latn" lang="nv"><a href="/wiki/A#Navajo" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Navajo <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span>
<dl><dd>a = <span class="IPA">/a˨/</span></dd>
<dd>ą = <span class="IPA">/ã˨/</span></dd>
<dd>á = <span class="IPA">/a˥/</span></dd>
<dd>ą́ = <span class="IPA">/ã˥/</span></dd>
<dd>aa = <span class="IPA">/aː˨˨/</span></dd>
<dd>ąą = <span class="IPA">/ãː˨˨/</span></dd>
<dd>áa = <span class="IPA">/aː˥˨/</span></dd>
<dd>ą́ą = <span class="IPA">/ãː˥˨/</span></dd>
<dd>aá = <span class="IPA">/aː˨˥/</span></dd>
<dd>ąą́ = <span class="IPA">/ãː˨˥/</span></dd>
<dd>áá = <span class="IPA">/aː˥˥/</span></dd>
<dd>ą́ą́ = <span class="IPA">/ãː˥˥/</span></dd></dl></li></ol>
