<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Neapolitan">Neapolitan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=497" title="Edit section: Neapolitan">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_72">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=498" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neapolitan_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Neapolitan phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_20">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=499" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/de#Latin" title="de">de</a></i> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ab#Latin" title="ab">ab</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_23">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=500" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nap">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/from" title="from">from</a> (referring to a place)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/by" title="by">by</a> (introducing the actor in the passive voice)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a> (implying necessity)</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_20">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=501" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_24">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=502" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nap">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/in" title="in">in</a> (locative: staying in a place of relative width)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a> (locative: moving towards a place of relative width)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a> (dative)</li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Norman">Norman</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=503" title="Edit section: Norman">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_9">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=504" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nrf">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guernsey" class="extiw" title="w:Guernsey">Guernsey</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#third_person" title="Appendix:Glossary">third-person</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#singular_number" title="Appendix:Glossary">singular</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#present_tense" title="Appendix:Glossary">present</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#indicative_mood" title="Appendix:Glossary">indicative</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="nrf"><a href="/wiki/aver#Norman" title="aver">aver</a></i></span></span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span id="Norwegian_Bokm.C3.A5l"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Norwegian_Bokmål">Norwegian Bokmål</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=505" title="Edit section: Norwegian Bokmål">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">Norwegian Bokmål <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nb:a" class="extiw" title="w:nb:a">a</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nb:a" class="extiw" title="w:nb:a">Wikipedia <sup>nb</sup></a></span></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_73">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=506" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">letter name</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norwegian_Bokm%C3%A5l_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Norwegian Bokmål phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">phoneme</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norwegian_Bokm%C3%A5l_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Norwegian Bokmål phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span>, <span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_22">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=507" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong> (<i>lowercase</i>, <i>uppercase</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/A#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Norwegian Bokmål <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>
<li>(<i>Latin script letters</i>) <a href="/wiki/A" title="A">A</a><a class="mw-selflink selflink">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/B" title="B">B</a><a href="/wiki/b" title="b">b</a>, <a href="/wiki/C" title="k">k</a>, <a href="/wiki/L" title="L">L</a><a href="/wiki/l" title="l">l</a>, <a href="/wiki/M" title="M">M</a><a href="/wiki/m" title="m">m</a>, <a href="/wiki/N" title="N">N</a><a href="/wiki/n" title="n">n</a>, <a href="/wiki/O" title="O">O</a><a href="/wiki/o" title="o">o</a>, <a href="/wiki/P" title="P">P</a><a href="/wiki/p" title="p">p</a>, <a href="/wiki/Q" <h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_22">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=509" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> (<i>definite singular</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/a-en#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="a-en">a-en</a></b>, <i>indefinite plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/w/index.php?title=a-er&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="a-er (page does not exist)">a-er</a></b>, <i>definite plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/w/index.php?title=a-ene&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="a-ene (page does not exist)">a-ene</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>the letter a
<dl><dd><i>fra a til å</i>
<dl><dd>from beginning to end</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb_4">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=510" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>short form of <span class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/anno#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="anno">anno</a></span></li>
<li>weakened form of <span class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/av#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="av">av</a></span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_25">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=511" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></span>, <a href="/wiki/up_to" title="up to">up to</a>
<dl><dd><i>ett a to år</i>
<dl><dd>one to two years</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<span class="use-with-mention">Used in <a href="/wiki/Italian#English" title="Italian">Italian</a> expressions</span>) <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/with#English" title="with">with</a></span>
<dl><dd><i>a konto</i>
<dl><dd><a href="/wiki/payment" title="payment">payment</a> on account</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<span class="use-with-mention">Used in <a href="/wiki/Latin#English" title="Latin">Latin</a> expressions, before a consonant</span>) <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/from#English" title="from">from</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/of#English" title="of">of</a></span>
<dl><dd><a href="/wiki/a_priori" title="a priori">a priori</a></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_17">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=512" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="à">à</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_24">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=513" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li>(<span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/dialectal#English" title="dialectal">dialectal</a>, used enclitically</span>) <a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a>; <i>object form of</i> <a href="/wiki/hun" title="hun">hun</a> (=<i><a href="/wiki/she" title="she">she</a></i>)
<dl><dd><i>hva gjorde du med a?</i>
<dl><dd>what did you do to her?</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<ol><li>(<span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/dialectal#English" title="dialectal">dialectal</a>, about grammatically feminine animals or objects</span>) <a href="/wiki/it" title="it">it</a>, <a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a>
<dl><dd><i>hvis katta stikker av, må du fange a!</i>
<dl><dd>if the cat runs away, you need to catch her!</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_6">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=514" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nb">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Expression of <a href="/wiki/surprise#English" title="surprise">surprise</a> or <a href="/wiki/horror#English" title="horror">horror</a></span>
<dl><dd><i>a, for noe tøv!</i>
<dl><dd>oh, such nonsense!</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Expression of <a href="/wiki/admiration#English" title="admiration">admiration</a> or <a href="/wiki/happiness#English" title="happiness">happiness</a></span>
<dl><dd><i>a, det gjorde godt!</i>
<dl><dd>oh, that felt good!</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Used with the words yes and no to give a sense of <a href="/wiki/impatience#English" title="impatience">impatience</a> or <a href="/wiki/rejection#English" title="rejection">rejection</a></span>
<dl><dd><i>a jo, men hold nå fred!</i>
<dl><dd>oh yes, but keep quiet now</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_18">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=515" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="nb"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A5#Norwegian_Bokmål" title="å">å</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="References_16">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=516" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ordbok.uib.no/perl/ordbok.cgi?OPP=a&amp;bokmaal=+&amp;ordbok=bokmaal">“a”</a> in <i>The Bokmål Dictionary</i>.</li>
<li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.naob.no/ordbok/a">“a”</a> in <i>Det Norske Akademis ordbok</i> (<i>NAOB</i>).</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Norwegian_Nynorsk">Norwegian Nynorsk</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=517" title="Edit section: Norwegian Nynorsk">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="sister-wikipedia sister-project noprint floatright" style="border: 1px solid #aaa; font-size: 90%; background: #f9f9f9; width: 250px; padding: 4px; text-align: left;"><div style="float: left;"><div class="floatnone"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/44px-Wikipedia-logo.png" decoding="async" width="44" height="44" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/66px-Wikipedia-logo.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Wikipedia-logo.png/88px-Wikipedia-logo.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200" /></div></div><div style="margin-left: 60px;">Norwegian Nynorsk <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a> has an article on:<div style="margin-left: 10px;"><b class="Latn" lang="nn"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nn:a" class="extiw" title="w:nn:a">a</a></b></div></div><span class="interProject"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/nn:a" class="extiw" title="w:nn:a">Wikipedia <sup>nn</sup></a></span></div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_74">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=518" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Norwegian_Nynorsk_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Norwegian Nynorsk pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span> <small>(<a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:ANO#Pronunciation" class="mw-redirect" title="Wiktionary:ANO">example</a> of pronunciation)</small></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_23">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=519" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nn">a</strong> (<i>lowercase</i>, <i>uppercase</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nn"><a href="/wiki/A#Norwegian_Nynorsk" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Norwegian Nynorsk <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_23">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=521" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nn">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> (<i>definite singular</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nn"><a href="/wiki/a-en#Norwegian_Nynorsk" title="a-en">a-en</a></b>, <i>indefinite plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nn"><a href="/wiki/a-ar#Norwegian_Nynorsk" title="a-ar">a-ar</a></b>, <i>definite plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="nn"><a href="/wiki/a-ane#Norwegian_Nynorsk" title="a-ane">a-ane</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>the letter a</li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Novial">Novial</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=522" title="Edit section: Novial">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_26">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=523" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="nov">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_19">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=524" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>When followed by the definite article <i class="Latn mention" lang="nov"><a href="/wiki/li#Novial" title="li">li</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="nov">a</i> may optionally be combined with the article to give <i class="Latn mention" lang="nov"><a href="/wiki/al#Novial" title="al">al</a></i>.
</p>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Occitan">Occitan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=525" title="Edit section: Occitan">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_75">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=526" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Occitan_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Occitan phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_21">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=527" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_Danish">Old Danish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=532" title="Edit section: Old Danish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_19">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=533" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="gmq-oda"><a href="/wiki/aa#Old_Danish" title="aa">aa</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">Jutlandic</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_76">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=534" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Danish_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Old Danish phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_22">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=535" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Norse" class="extiw" title="w:Old Norse">Old Norse</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="non"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Norse" title="á">á</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahw%C5%8D" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahwō">*ahwō</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_24">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=536" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="gmq-oda">ā</strong> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Latn" lang="gmq-oda"><a href="/wiki/ar#Old_Danish" title="ar">ār</a></b>, <i>plural</i> <b class="Latn" lang="gmq-oda"><a href="/wiki/ar#Old_Danish" title="ar">ār</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scania" class="extiw" title="w:Scania">Scania</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/stream" title="stream">stream</a>, <a href="/wiki/river" title="river">river</a></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_2">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=537" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Danish: <span class="Latn" lang="da"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A5#Danish" title="å">å</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_22">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=538" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Norse" class="extiw" title="w:Old Norse">Old Norse</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="non"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Norse" title="á">á</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ana" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ana">*ana</a></i>.
</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_Dutch">Old Dutch</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=543" title="Edit section: Old Dutch">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_25">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=544" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahw%C5%8D" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/ahwō">*ahwō</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82ek%CA%B7eh%E2%82%82" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂ekʷeh₂">*h₂ekʷeh₂</a></i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_25">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=545" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="odt">ā</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/river" title="river">river</a>, <a href="/wiki/stream" title="stream">stream</a>, <a href="/wiki/water" title="water">water</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Inflection_4">Inflection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=546" title="Edit section: Inflection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<ul><li>Middle Dutch: <span class="Latn" lang="dum"><a href="/wiki/a#Middle_Dutch" title="a">â</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/>
<ul><li>Dutch: <span class="Latn" lang="nl"><a href="/wiki/a#Dutch" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading_7">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=549" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>“<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://gtb.inl.nl/iWDB/search?wdb=ONW&amp;actie=article&amp;id=ID466">ā, ē</a>”, in&#32;<cite>Oudnederlands Woordenboek</cite>, 2012</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_English">Old English</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=550" title="Edit section: Old English">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_26">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=551" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Germanic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Germanic language">Proto-Germanic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="gem-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/aiwaz" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Germanic/aiwaz">*aiwaz</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">eternity, age</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82eyu-" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂eyu-">*h₂eyu-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">vitality</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Saxon" class="extiw" title="w:Old Saxon">Old Saxon</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="osx"><a href="/wiki/eo#Old_Saxon" title="eo">eo</a></i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_High_German" class="extiw" title="w:Old High German">Old High German</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="goh"><a href="/wiki/io#Old_High_German" title="io">io</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="goh"><a href="/wiki/eo#Old_High_German" title="eo">eo</a></i> (<span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language">German</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href="/wiki/je#German" title="je">je</a></i>), <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Norse" class="extiw" title="w:Old Norse">Old Norse</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="non"><a href="/wiki/ei#Old_Norse" title="ei">ei</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="non"><a href="/wiki/ey#Old_Norse" title="ey">ey</a></i> (<span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_language" class="extiw" title="w:English language">English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/aye#English" title="aye">aye</a></i>), <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gothic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Gothic language">Gothic</a></span> <i class="Goth mention" lang="got"><a href="/wiki/%F0%90%8C%B0%F0%90%8C%B9%F0%90%8D%85#Gothic" title="𐌰𐌹𐍅">𐌰𐌹𐍅</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="got-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href="/wiki/aiw#Gothic" title="aiw">aiw</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_77">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=552" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Old_English_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Old English pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɑː/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb_5">Adverb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=553" title="Edit section: Adverb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latinx headword" lang="ang">ā</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/ever" title="ever">ever</a>, <a href="/wiki/always" title="always">always</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_5">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=554" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>English: <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/ay#English" title="ay">ay</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/>, <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/aye#English" title="aye">aye</a></span></li>
<li>Scots: <span class="Latn" lang="sco"><a href="/wiki/ay#Scots" title="ay">ay</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/>, <span class="Latn" lang="sco"><a href="/wiki/aye#Scots" title="aye">aye</a></span></li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_French">Old French</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=555" title="Edit section: Old French">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_23">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=556" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_24">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=557" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="fro">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="fro"><a href="/wiki/A#Old_French" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Old French <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_23">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=558" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_21">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=559" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="fro"><a href="/wiki/ad#Old_French" title="ad">ad</a></span></li>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_Irish">Old Irish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=566" title="Edit section: Old Irish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_78">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=567" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Old_Irish_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Old Irish pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_24">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=568" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/sindom&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/sindom (page does not exist)">*sindom</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">this</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_23">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=569" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">relative pronoun</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/an#Old_Irish" title="an">an</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_11">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=570" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><span class="inflection-of-conjoined"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#nominative_case" title="Appendix:Glossary">nominative</a><span class="inflection-of-sep">/</span><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#accusative_case" title="Appendix:Glossary">accusative</a></span> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#singular_number" title="Appendix:Glossary">singular</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#gender" title="Appendix:Glossary">neuter</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/in#Old_Irish" title="in">in</a></i></span></span>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>800</b>, Würzburg Glosses on the Pauline Epistles, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;499–712,&#32;Wb. 15<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">b</small></small>28
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga"><b>A</b> mbás tiagme-ni do·áirci bethid dúib-si.</span>
<dl><dd>The death to which we go causes life unto you.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_25">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=571" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> (<i>triggers <a href="/wiki/eclipsis" title="eclipsis">eclipsis</a>, takes a leniting relative clause</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a> <a href="/wiki/which" title="which">which</a>, <a href="/wiki/what" title="what">what</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>875</b>, Milan Glosses on the Psalms, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;7–483,&#32;Ml. 112<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">b</small></small>13
<dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="sga">Is demniu liunn <b>a</b> n-ad·chiam hua sulib ol·daas an ro·chluinemmar hua chluasaib.</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">What we see with the eyes is more certain for us than what we hear with the ears.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_7">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=572" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Irish: <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/a#Irish" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_24">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=573" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_7">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=574" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/eclipsis" title="eclipsis">eclipsis</a>, takes a nasalizing relative clause</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/when" title="when">when</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>875</b>, Milan Glosses on the Psalms, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;7–483,&#32;Ml. 55<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">d</small></small>11
<dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="sga">Ícaid-som didiu anisin, <b>a</b> n-as·mbeir <span class="Latn" lang="la">“iudicia Domini abyssus multa”</span>.</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">He solves that then, when he says “iudicia Domini abyssus multa”.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>875</b>, Milan Glosses on the Psalms, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;7–483,&#32;Ml. 112<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">b</small></small>17
<dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="sga"><b>a</b> nonda imbide</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">and when you <span class="gender"><abbr title="singular number">sg</abbr></span> are hedged in</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_15">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=575" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyo (page does not exist)">*esyo</a></i> (<span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> and <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span>), <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esy%C4%81s&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esyās (page does not exist)">*esyās</a></i> (<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span>), and <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/es%C5%8Dm&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/esōm (page does not exist)">*esōm</a></i> (<span class="gender"><abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span>); compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welsh_language" class="extiw" title="w:Welsh language">Welsh</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cy"><a href="/wiki/ei#Welsh" title="ei">ei</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">his, her, its</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="cy"><a href="/wiki/eu#Welsh" title="eu">eu</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">their</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; Old High German <i class="Latn mention" lang="goh"><a href="/wiki/iro#Old_High_German" title="iro">iro</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">their</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; and Sanskrit <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="अस्य (page does not exist)">अस्य</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">asyá</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">his, its</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="अस्यास् (page does not exist)">अस्यास्</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">asyā́s</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">her</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E0%A4%8F%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="एषाम् (page does not exist)">एषाम्</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">eṣā́m</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">their</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_24">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=576" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Irish" title="á">á</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/ha#Old_Irish" title="ha">ha</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Determiner_7">Determiner</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=577" title="Edit section: Determiner">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> (<i>predicative</i> <b class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/a%C3%AD#Old_Irish" title="aí">aí</a></b> <i>or</i> <b class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1e#Old_Irish" title="áe">áe</a></b>) <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/lenition" title="lenition">lenition</a> in the masculine and neuter singular, an unwritten prothetic /h/ before a vowel in the feminine singular, and <a href="/wiki/eclipsis" title="eclipsis">eclipsis</a> in the plural</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/his" title="his">his</a>, <a href="/wiki/its" title="its">its</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>800</b>, Würzburg Glosses on the Pauline Epistles, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;499–712,&#32;Wb. 5<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">a</small></small>23
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga">Cossóit <b>a</b> thuaithe fri Dia inso.</span>
<dl><dd>This is a slandering of his folk before God.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>800</b>, Würzburg Glosses on the Pauline Epistles, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;499–712,&#32;Wb. 5<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">d</small></small>10
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga">Bad hi forcitul .i. <b>a</b> chomalnad condib desimrecht do chách.</span>
<dl><dd>Let it be in teaching, that is, to fulfill it [lit. "its fulfillment"] so that he may be an example to everyone.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a>, <a href="/wiki/its" title="its">its</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>845</b>, St. Gall Glosses on Priscian, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1975, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;II, pp.&#160;49–224,&#32;Sg. 32<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">b</small></small>6
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga"><b>A</b> mmuntar-sidi ad·rothreb-si lee, it he con·rótgatar in cathraig.</span>
<dl><dd>Her folk whom she had with her, it is they who built the city.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/their" title="their">their</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>800</b>, Würzburg Glosses on the Pauline Epistles, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;499–712,&#32;Wb. 24<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">a</small></small>38
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga">Ní epur <b>a</b> n-anman sund.</span>
<dl><dd>I do not say their names here.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_8">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=578" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Irish: <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/a#Irish" title="a">a</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">his, her, its, their</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li>
<li>Scottish Gaelic: <span class="Latn" lang="gd"><a href="/wiki/a#Scottish_Gaelic" title="a">a</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">his, her, its</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/>; <span class="Latn" lang="gd"><a href="/wiki/an#Scottish_Gaelic" title="an">an</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">their</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_9">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=579" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/%C5%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/ō (page does not exist)">*ō</a></i> (compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welsh_language" class="extiw" title="w:Welsh language">Welsh</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cy"><a href="/wiki/a#Welsh" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C5%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ō (page does not exist)">*ō</a></i> (compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%E1%BD%A6#Ancient_Greek" title="ὦ">ὦ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ô</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/o#Latin" title="o">ō</a></i>).
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_25">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=580" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Irish" title="á">á</a></span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_12">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=581" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers <a href="/wiki/lenition" title="lenition">lenition</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/O#English" title="O">O</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">vocative particle</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>875</b>, Milan Glosses on the Psalms, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;7–483,&#32;Ml. 134<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">d</small></small>3
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga">Ar·troídfe-siu inna drochdaíni, <b>a</b> Dǽ, dia n-anduch, air is fechtnach a n-andach mani erthroítar húa Día.</span>
<dl><dd>Thou wilt restrain the evil men, O God, from their iniquity, for their iniquity is prosperous if it be not restrained by God.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_9">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=582" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Irish: <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/a#Irish" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_5">Etymology 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=583" title="Edit section: Etymology 5">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_13">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=584" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">triggers an unwritten prothetic /h/ before a vowel</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">introduces a numeral</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="sga">a deich</i> ― <span class="e-translation">ten</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_10">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=585" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Irish: <span class="Latn" lang="ga"><a href="/wiki/a#Irish" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_6_3">Etymology 6</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=586" title="Edit section: Etymology 6">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Celtic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Celtic language">Proto-Celtic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="cel-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/exs" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Celtic/exs">*exs</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%81e%C7%B5%CA%B0s" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₁eǵʰs">*h₁eǵʰs</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_30">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=587" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="sga">a</strong> (<i>combined with plural article</i> <b class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/w/index.php?title=asnaib&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="asnaib (page does not exist)">asnaib</a></b>, <i>combined with 1st singular possessive determiner</i> <b class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/asmo#Old_Irish" title="asmo">asmo</a></b>, <i>combined with 3rd person possessive determiner</i> <b class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/assa#Old_Irish" title="assa">assa</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/out_of" title="out of">out of</a>
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#c." title="Appendix:Glossary">c.</a></i> <b>875</b>, Milan Glosses on the Psalms, published in <i>Thesaurus Palaeohibernicus</i> (reprinted 1987, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies), edited and with translations by Whitley Stokes and John Strachan, vol.&#160;I, pp.&#160;7–483,&#32;Ml. 127<small><small style="position:relative;top:-.5em">d</small></small>6
<dl><dd><span class="Latn" lang="sga">in tan ro·mmemaid re n-Abrachan forsna coíc riga bertar Loth <b>a</b> Sodaim</span>
<dl><dd>when the five kings who carried Lot out of Sodom had been routed by Abraham</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Inflection_5">Inflection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=588" title="Edit section: Inflection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>

</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><b>3d sing. masc./neut., dative</b>
</td>
<td style="text-align:center;background-color:#ffffff;"><span class="Latn" lang="sga"><a href="/wiki/as#Old_Irish" title="as">as</a>(<a href="/wiki/ass#Old_Irish" title="ass">s</a>), <a href="/wiki/es#Old_Irish" title="es">es</a></span>

<td style="text-align:center;background-color:#ffffff;">
