<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Old_Portuguese">Old Portuguese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=592" title="Edit section: Old Portuguese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_79">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=593" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Portuguese_phonology" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Old Portuguese phonology">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_25">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=594" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near; at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_31">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=595" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="roa-opt">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/towards#English" title="towards">towards</a></span>
<ul><li><b>13th century</b>, attributed to <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfonso_X_of_Castile" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Alfonso X of Castile">Alfonso X of Castile</a>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cantigas_de_Santa_Maria" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Cantigas de Santa Maria">Cantigas de Santa Maria</a></i>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cantigas_de_Santa_Maria#Codices" class="extiw" title="w:Cantigas de Santa Maria">E codex</a>, <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cantigasdesantamaria.com/csm/14">cantiga 14</a>&#160;(<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.pbm.com/~lindahl/cantigas/facsimiles/E/080.html">facsimile</a>):
<dl><dd>fugiu con el <b>a</b> Egipto. terra de Reẏ Faraon.
<dl><dd>ran away with him <b>to</b> Egypt, land of the Pharaoh king.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_12">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=596" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Fala: <span class="Latn" lang="fax"><a href="/wiki/a#Fala" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li>
<li>Galician: <span class="Latn" lang="gl"><a href="/wiki/a#Galician" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li>
<li>Portuguese: <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/a#Portuguese" title="a">a</a></span><ul><li>Indo-Portuguese: <span class="Latn" lang="idb"><a href="/wiki/a#Indo-Portuguese" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_25">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=597" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_12">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=598" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="roa-opt">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Alternative spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Old_Portuguese" title="á">á</a></i></span></span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Polish">Polish</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=599" title="Edit section: Polish">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_27">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=600" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Probably from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/a" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/a">*a</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Balto-Slavic/%C5%8D" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Balto-Slavic/ō">*ō</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%81%C5%8Dd&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₁ōd (page does not exist)">*h₁ōd</a></i> (presumed to be the ablative of <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A9y" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/éy">*éy, h₁e</a></i>). Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language">Lithuanian</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt"><a href="/wiki/o#Lithuanian" title="o">õ</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Russian language">Russian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="/wiki/%D0%B0#Russian" title="а">а</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">and, but</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_80">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=601" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Polish_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Polish pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_18" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.49" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Pl-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/51/Pl-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (122 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="121812" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/5/51/Pl-a.ogg/Pl-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="149760" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Pl-a.ogg" title="File:Pl-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_8">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=602" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pl">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a>; <a href="/wiki/but" title="but">but</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pl"><b>A</b> ty?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>And</b> you?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pl">Wolisz tabletki, <b>a</b> ja wolę zastrzyki.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">You prefer pills <b>and</b> I prefer injections.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pl">walka między dobrem <b>a</b> złem</i> ― <span class="e-translation">battle between good and evil</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading_8">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=603" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.wsjp.pl/index.php?szukaj=a">a</a> in <i>Wielki słownik języka polskiego</i>, Instytut Języka Polskiego PAN</li>
<li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://sjp.pwn.pl/szukaj/a.html">a</a> in Polish dictionaries at PWN</li></ul>
<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Portuguese">Portuguese</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=604" title="Edit section: Portuguese">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_81">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=605" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<dl><dt>letter</dt></dl>
<ul><li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r50165410"/><table class="audiotable" style="vertical-align: bottom; display:inline-block; list-style:none;line-height: 1em; border-collapse:collapse;"><tbody><tr><td class="unicode audiolink" style="padding-right:5px; padding-left: 0;">Audio</td><td class="audiofile"><div class="mediaContainer" style="width:175px"><audio id="mwe_player_19" controls="" preload="none" style="width:175px" class="kskin" data-durationhint="0.70730158730159" data-startoffset="0" data-mwtitle="Pt-br-a.ogg" data-mwprovider="wikimediacommons"><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/08/Pt-br-a.ogg" type="audio/ogg; codecs=&quot;vorbis&quot;" data-title="Original Ogg file (164 kbps)" data-shorttitle="Ogg source" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="164185" /><source src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/transcoded/0/08/Pt-br-a.ogg/Pt-br-a.ogg.mp3" type="audio/mpeg" data-title="MP3" data-shorttitle="MP3" data-transcodekey="mp3" data-width="0" data-height="0" data-bandwidth="227760" /></audio></div></td><td class="audiometa" style="font-size: 80%;">(<a href="/wiki/File:Pt-br-a.ogg" title="File:Pt-br-a.ogg">file</a>)</td></tr></tbody></table></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Portuguese_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Portuguese pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ˈa/</span>
<ul><li><span class="homophones"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#homophone" title="Appendix:Glossary">Homophones</a>: <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/h%C3%A1#Portuguese" title="há">há</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0#Portuguese" title="à">à</a></span></span></li></ul></li>
<li>Hyphenation: <span class="Latn" lang="pt">a</span></li></ul>
<dl><dt>article, pronoun</dt></dl>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazilian_Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Brazilian Portuguese">Brazil</a><span class="ib-comma qualifier-comma">,</span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:European Portuguese">Portugal</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Portuguese_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Portuguese pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/ɐ/</span></li>
<li>Hyphenation: <span class="Latn" lang="pt">a</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_26">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=606" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/a#Latin" title="a">a</a></i>, form of <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/A#Latin" title="A">A</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Etruscan_language" class="extiw" title="w:Etruscan language">Etruscan</a></span> <i class="Ital mention" lang="ett"><a href="/wiki/%F0%90%8C%80#Etruscan" title="𐌀">𐌀</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ett-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">a</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek">Ancient Greek</a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc"><a href="/wiki/%CE%91#Ancient_Greek" title="Α">Α</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">A</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">alpha</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenician_language" class="extiw" title="w:Phoenician language">Phoenician</a></span> <i class="Phnx mention" lang="phn"><a href="/wiki/%F0%90%A4%80#Phoenician" title="𐤀">𐤀</a></i>&#8206; <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="phn-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ʾ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">aleph</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egyptian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Egyptian language">Egyptian</a></span> <i class="Egyp mention" lang="egy"><a href="/wiki/%F0%93%83%BE#Egyptian" title="𓃾">𓃾</a></i>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_25">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=607" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/A#Portuguese" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-letter"> <span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Portuguese <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_26">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=609" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong> <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> (<i>plural</i> <b class="Latn form-of lang-pt p-form-of" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/as#Portuguese" title="as">as</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-letter_name"> <span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Alternative spelling of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A1#Portuguese" title="á">á</a></i></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_26">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=612" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician-Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Galician-Portuguese">Old Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/illa#Latin" title="illa">illa</a></i> (with the disappearance of an initial <i>l</i>; compare <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spanish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Spanish language">Spanish</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="es"><a href="/wiki/la#Spanish" title="la">la</a></i>).
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_13">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=613" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-feminine_definite_article"> <span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#gender" title="Appendix:Glossary">feminine</a> <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#singular_number" title="Appendix:Glossary">singular</a> of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/o#Portuguese" title="o">o</a></i></span></span>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2005</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._K._Rowling" class="extiw" title="w:J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a>,  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/pt:Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" class="extiw" title="w:pt:Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">Harry Potter e o Enigma do Príncipe</a></cite> &#91;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince</a></cite>&#93; (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>&#59; 6), Rio de Janeiro&#58; Rocco, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9788532519474" title="Special:BookSources/9788532519474">→ISBN</a></small>, page 219:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="pt">Então, como foi <b>a</b> última festinha de Slughorn?</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">So, how was the last Slughorn's little party?</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2007</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._K._Rowling" class="extiw" title="w:J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a>,  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/pt:Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" class="extiw" title="w:pt:Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte</a></cite> &#91;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows</a></cite>&#93; (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>&#59; 7), Rio de Janeiro&#58; Rocco, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9788532522610" title="Special:BookSources/9788532522610">→ISBN</a></small>, page 147:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="pt">Entregou <b>a</b> foto rasgada, [...]</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">He handed over the torn photograph, [...]</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_26">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=616" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong>&#160;<span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> (<i>third-person singular</i>)
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-fsg_direct_objective_pronoun"> <a href="/wiki/her" title="her">Her</a>, <a href="/wiki/it" title="it">it</a> (as a direct object; as an indirect object, see <a href="/wiki/lhe" title="lhe">lhe</a>; after prepositions, see <a href="/wiki/ela" title="ela">ela</a>).
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Encontrei-<b>a</b> na rua.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I met her/it on the street.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_20">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=617" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Becomes <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/la#Portuguese" title="la">-la</a></i> after verb forms ending in <i>-r, -s</i>, or <i>-z</i>, the pronouns <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/nos#Portuguese" title="nos">nos</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">us</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/vos#Portuguese" title="vos">vos</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">plural you</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, and the adverb <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/eis#Portuguese" title="eis">eis</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">here is; behold</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; the final letter causing the change disappears.
<dl><dd>After <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/ver#Portuguese" title="ver">ver</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to see</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>: <i>Posso vê-<b>la</b>?</i> — “May I see <b>her/it</b>?”|inline=1}}</dd>
<dd>After <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/p%C3%B4s#Portuguese" title="pôs">pôs</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">he/she/it put</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>: <i>Ele pô-<b>la</b> ali.</i> — “He put <b>her/it</b> there.”</dd>
<dd>After <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/fiz#Portuguese" title="fiz">fiz</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">I made; I did</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>: <i>Fi-<b>la</b> ficar contente.</i> — “I made <b>her/it</b> become happy.”</dd>
<dd>After <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/nos#Portuguese" title="nos">nos</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">us</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>: <i>Ela deu-no-<b>la</b> relutantemente.</i> — “She gave <b>her/it</b> to us reluctantly.”</dd>
<dd>After <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/eis#Portuguese" title="eis">eis</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">here is; behold</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>: <i>Ei-<b>la</b>!</i> — “Behold <b>her/it</b>!”</dd></dl></li>
<li>Becomes <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/na#Portuguese" title="na">-na</a></i> after a nasal vowel or diphthong: <i>-ão, -am</i> [ɐ̃w̃], <i>-õe</i> [õj̃], <i>-em, -êm</i> [ẽj̃].
<dl><dd><i>Detêm-<b>na</b> como prisioneira.</i> — “They detain <b>her/it</b> as a prisoner.”</dd></dl></li>
<li>In informal Brazilian Portuguese, the nominative form <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/ela#Portuguese" title="ela">ela</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">she</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> is more commonly used.
<dl><dd><i>Eu <b>a</b> vi.</i> → <i>Eu vi <b>ela</b>.</i>: “I saw <b>her/it</b>.”</dd></dl></li></ul>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Quotations_3">Quotations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=618" title="Edit section: Quotations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p><span class="see-cites">For quotations of use of this term, see <a href="/wiki/Citations:a#Portuguese" title="Citations:a">Citations:a</a>.</span>
</p>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_16">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=620" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galician-Portuguese" class="extiw" title="w:Galician-Portuguese">Old Portuguese</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="roa-opt"><a href="/wiki/a#Old_Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">to</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> and <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ab#Latin" title="ab">ab</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">from, away, by</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_32">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=621" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-introduces_indirect_object"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><i>introduces the indirect object</i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2005</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._K._Rowling" class="extiw" title="w:J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a>,  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/pt:Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" class="extiw" title="w:pt:Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">Harry Potter e o Enigma do Príncipe</a></cite> &#91;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince</a></cite>&#93; (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>&#59; 6), Rio de Janeiro&#58; Rocco, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9788532519474" title="Special:BookSources/9788532519474">→ISBN</a></small>, page 143:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="pt">Deixe-me mostrar <b>a</b> você...</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">Let me show it <b>to</b> you...</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li>
<li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>2007</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._K._Rowling" class="extiw" title="w:J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a>,  <cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/pt:Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" class="extiw" title="w:pt:Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte</a></cite> &#91;<cite><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows</a></cite>&#93; (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Potter" class="extiw" title="w:Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>&#59; 7), Rio de Janeiro&#58; Rocco, <small><a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/9788532522610" title="Special:BookSources/9788532522610">→ISBN</a></small>, page 516:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Latn e-quotation" lang="pt">Não é bonito dizer isso <b>a</b> uma pessoa.</span><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">It's not nice to say that <b>to</b> a person.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Dê-o <b>a</b> mim.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Give it <b>to</b> me.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Meu coração pertence <b>a</b> você.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">My heart belongs <b>to</b> you.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonym:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/para#Portuguese" title="para">para</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-indicates_destination"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/towards#English" title="towards">towards</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><i>indicates destination</i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Vamos <b>a</b> Paris!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Let’s go <b>to</b> Paris!</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonyms:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/para#Portuguese" title="para">para</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/at%C3%A9#Portuguese" title="até">até</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-indicates_physical_distance"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/away#English" title="away">away</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><i>indicates a physical distance</i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">A vila fica <b>a</b> onze milhas</i> ― <span class="e-translation">The village is eleven miles <b>away</b>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Comunicação <b>à</b> distância.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Communication <b>at a</b> distance.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-by_means_of"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/with#English" title="with">with</a></span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/by_means_of#English" title="by means of">by means of</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">using as an instrument or means</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Mataram o cão <b>a</b> pauladas.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">They bludgeoned the dog to death. (literally: they killed the dog <b>with</b> bludgeonings)</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt"><a href="/w/index.php?title=a_cavalo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="a cavalo (page does not exist)">A cavalo</a>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>On</b> horseback.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Livro escrito <b>a</b> lápis.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">A book written <b>with</b> a pencil.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonyms:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/com#Portuguese" title="com">com</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/por_meio_de#Portuguese" title="por meio de">por meio de</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-using_as_a_medium"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/with#English" title="with">with</a></span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/on#English" title="on">on</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">using as a medium or fuel</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Quadro pintado <b>a</b> óleo.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">A painting painted <b>with</b> oil.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Fornalha <b>a</b> carvão.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Coal furnace.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-in_the_specified_measurement_or_quantity"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/by#English" title="by">by</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">using the specified measurement; in the specified quantity</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">É mais barato comprar comida <b>ao</b> quilo.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">It is cheaper to by food <b>by the</b> kilogram.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Os fracassos ocorrem <b>às</b> dezenas.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Failures occur <b>by the</b> dozen.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-indicates_steady_progression"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">preceded and followed by the same word</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/by#English" title="by">by</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><i>indicates a steady progression</i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Calma lá. Resolva o problema passo <b>a</b> passo.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Easy there. Solve the problem step <b>by</b> step.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonym:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/por#Portuguese" title="por">por</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-in_the_style_or_manner_of"> <span class="use-with-mention">in the style or manner of</span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/a_la#English" title="a la">a la</a></span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Ele puxou o temperamento <b>ao</b> pai.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He inherited his temperament <b>from</b> his father.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Camarão <b>à</b> grega.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Greek-<b>style</b> shrimp.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonym:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/ao#Portuguese" title="ao">ao</a> <a href="/wiki/modo#Portuguese" title="modo">modo</a> <a href="/wiki/de#Portuguese" title="de">de</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-during_the_specified_period"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">limited use<span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;see usage notes</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/at#English" title="at">at</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">during the specified period</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Dormimos <b>à</b> noite.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">We sleep <b>at</b> night.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">O filme começa <b>às</b> duas horas.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">The film starts <b>at</b> two o’clock.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonyms:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/em#Portuguese" title="em">em</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/de#Portuguese" title="de">de</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-indicates_location_or_position"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">rare&#32;&#32;except in set terms</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/at#English" title="at">at</a></span>; <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/in#English" title="in">in</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><i>indicates a location or position</i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Isso fica <b>à</b> frente do altar.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">This stays <b>in</b> front of the altar.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonym:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/em#Portuguese" title="em">em</a></span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-introduces_the_direct_object_emphatically"> <span class="use-with-mention">indicates the direct object, mainly to avoid confusion when it, the subject, or both are displaced, or for emphasis</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt"><b>A</b> mim ele não engana.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He doesn’t deceive me.</span> (literally, “<span class="e-literally">To me he doesn’t deceive.</span>”)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-forms_the_present_participle"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal" class="extiw" title="w:Portugal">Portugal</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span>&#32;followed by a verb in the infinitive form</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">forms the present participle; in Brazil, the gerund is used instead</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Estou <b>a</b> preparar a canja</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I am prepar<b>ing</b> the chicken soup</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-forms_the_future_participle"> <span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">followed by an infinitive or present passive</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">forms the future participle</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Um trabalho <b>a</b> ser feito.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">A job <b>to</b> be done.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt">Nada <b>a</b> fazer.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Nothing <b>to</b> be done.</span></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate">Synonyms:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/para#Portuguese" title="para">para</a></span>, <span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/por#Portuguese" title="por">por</a></span></span></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_21">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=622" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p><i>When followed by a definite article</i>, <b>a</b> <i>is combined with the article to give the following combined forms</i>:
</p>
<ul><li><i>a</i> + <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/o#Portuguese" title="o">o</a></i> → <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/ao#Portuguese" title="ao">ao</a></i></li>
<li><i>a</i> + <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/os#Portuguese" title="os">os</a></i> → <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/aos#Portuguese" title="aos">aos</a></i></li>
<li><i>a</i> + <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/a#Portuguese" title="a">a</a></i> → <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0#Portuguese" title="à">à</a></i></li>
<li><i>a</i> + <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/as#Portuguese" title="as">as</a></i> → <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/%C3%A0s#Portuguese" title="às">às</a></i></li></ul>
<p>In the sense of <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/to#English" title="to">to</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">introducing the indirect object</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, usage with a personal pronoun can be replaced with an indirect pronoun (<i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/me#Portuguese" title="me">me</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/nos#Portuguese" title="nos">nos</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/te#Portuguese" title="te">te</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/vos#Portuguese" title="vos">vos</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/lhe#Portuguese" title="lhe">lhe</a></i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/lhes#Portuguese" title="lhes">lhes</a></i>):
</p>
<ul><li><i>Deram um livro <b>a ele</b>.</i> → <i>Deram-<b>lhe</b> um livro.</i></li></ul>
<p>In the sense of <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/at#English" title="at">at</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">during the specified period</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, it can be used with:
</p>
<ul><li><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/noite#Portuguese" title="noite">noite</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">night</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/noitinha#Portuguese" title="noitinha">noitinha</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">evening</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/tarde#Portuguese" title="tarde">tarde</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">afternoon</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/meio-dia#Portuguese" title="meio-dia">meio-dia</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">noon</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/meia-noite#Portuguese" title="meia-noite">meia-noite</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">midnight</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li>specific hours</li></ul>
<p><i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/dia#Portuguese" title="dia">Dia</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">day</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/manh%C3%A3#Portuguese" title="manhã">manhã</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">morning</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/madrugada#Portuguese" title="madrugada">madrugada</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">early morning</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> use <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/de#Portuguese" title="de">de</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">of</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> instead, which can optionally be used for <i>tarde</i>, <i>noitinha</i> and <i>noite</i> as well. Names of months, days of the month and of the week use <i class="Latn mention" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/em#Portuguese" title="em">em</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">in</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Quotations_4">Quotations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=623" title="Edit section: Quotations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p><span class="see-cites">For quotations of use of this term, see <a href="/wiki/Citations:a#Portuguese" title="Citations:a">Citations:a</a>.</span>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Descendants_13">Descendants</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=624" title="Edit section: Descendants">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li>Indo-Portuguese: <span class="Latn" lang="idb"><a href="/wiki/a#Indo-Portuguese" title="a">a</a></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r54857417"/></li></ul>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_38">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=625" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>

<li><span class="Latn" lang="pt"><a href="/wiki/para#Portuguese" title="para">para</a></span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_10">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=626" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_7">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=627" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="pt">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li><li class="senseid" id="Portuguese-oh"> <span class="Latn" lang="en"><a href="/wiki/oh#English" title="oh">oh</a></span> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">expression of mild surprise</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="pt"><b>A</b>, tudo bem então.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation"><b>Oh</b>, all right then.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Quotations_5">Quotations</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=628" title="Edit section: Quotations">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p><span class="see-cites">For quotations of use of this term, see <a href="/wiki/Citations:a#Portuguese" title="Citations:a">Citations:a</a>.</span>

</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Rapa_Nui">Rapa Nui</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=635" title="Edit section: Rapa Nui">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_14">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=636" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="rap">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href="/wiki/possessive#English" title="possessive">possessive</a> <a href="/wiki/particle#English" title="particle">particle</a> marking an <a href="/wiki/alienable#English" title="alienable">alienable</a> possession</span>; <a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_22">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=637" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Inserted before the relevant pronoun. Only for possessions like houses or beliefs that have the ability to no longer be yours; otherwise, use <span class="serial-comma">,</span>.
</p>
<hr />

<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="rom">a</strong>
</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Romanian">Romanian</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=641" title="Edit section: Romanian">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_82">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=642" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:International_Phonetic_Alphabet" title="Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet">IPA</a><sup>(<a href="/wiki/Appendix:Romanian_pronunciation" title="Appendix:Romanian pronunciation">key</a>)</sup>:&#32;<span class="IPA">/a/</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_26">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=643" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ro">a</strong> (<i>lower case</i>, <i>upper case</i> <b class="Latn" lang="ro"><a href="/wiki/A#Romanian" title="A">A</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The first <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the Romanian <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i><a href="/wiki/a#Romanian" title="a">a</a></i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_27">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=645" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Article_14">Article</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=646" title="Edit section: Article">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ro">a</strong> (<i>feminine singular possessive article</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ro">sora mea și <b>a</b> lui Alexandru</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">my and Alexandru's sister</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ro">cartea este <b>a</b> mea</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation">the book is mine</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms coordinate-term"><span class="defdate">Coordinate terms:</span> <span class="Latn" lang="ro"><a href="/wiki/al#Romanian" title="al">al</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">masculine/neuter singular</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, <span class="Latn" lang="ro"><a href="/wiki/ai#Romanian" title="ai">ai</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">masculine plural</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, <span class="Latn" lang="ro"><a href="/wiki/ale#Romanian" title="ale">ale</a></span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">feminine/neuter plural</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></span></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_27">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=647" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin">Latin</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href="/wiki/ad#Latin" title="ad">ad</a></i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/%C3%A1d" class="mw-redirect" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/ád">*ád</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">near; at</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_33">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=648" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Latn headword" lang="ro">a</strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">used with infinitive verbs</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="use-with-mention">the infinitive marker:</span> <a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Latn mention e-example" lang="ro"><b>A</b> fi.</i><dl><dd><span class="e-translation"><b>To</b> be.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href="/wiki/Appendix:Glossary#archaic" title="Appendix:Glossary">archaic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a> (now almost completely replaced by <i class="Latn mention" lang="ro"><a href="/wiki/la#Romanian" title="la">la</a></i>)</li>
<li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-3">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/like" title="like">like</a></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_17">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=649" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From proto-Romanian, from a late <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-4">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-5">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong><sup id="cite_ref-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-8">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_14">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=650" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-6">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-7">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
<dl><dd>(he/she) <a href="/wiki/has" title="has">has</a>...
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-8">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_23">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=651" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-9">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> is used instead of <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-10">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> to form the third-person singular perfect compus.
</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Scots">Scots</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=658" title="Edit section: Scots">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_28">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=659" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_27">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=660" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-17">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-18">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-19">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, called <i>[[aw#<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-20">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>|aw]]</i> and written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_40">See also</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=661" title="Edit section: See also">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_28">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=662" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-22">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-23">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.

</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/a#Etymology_2_2" title="a">a</a>, <a href="/wiki/an#Etymology_1" title="an">an</a> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-26">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_24">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=665" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>Unlike English, this form can be used before both consonant and vowel sounds.</li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Scottish_Gaelic">Scottish Gaelic</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=670" title="Edit section: Scottish Gaelic">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_28">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=671" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-33">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/his" title="his">his</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/her" title="her">her</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/its" title="its">its</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/who" title="who">who</a>, <a href="/wiki/which" title="which">which</a>, <a href="/wiki/that" title="that">that</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_25">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=672" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li>As <b>his</b>/<b>its</b> <a href="/wiki/lenite" title="lenite">lenites</a> the following word.
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-34">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-35">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>As <b>his</b>/<b>its</b> is omitted if the following word begins with a <a href="/wiki/vowel" title="vowel">vowel</a> or <b>fh</b> followed by a vowel.
<dl><dd><i>athair</i> - a father <i>or</i> his father <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-36">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_34">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=673" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-37">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-38">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_15">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=674" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-39">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-40">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-41">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>Used before <a href="/wiki/cardinal_numbers" title="cardinal numbers">cardinal numbers</a> which are not followed by a noun.
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-42">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>Used before the <a href="/wiki/vocative" title="vocative">vocative</a> form.
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-43">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_26">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=678" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-45">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-46">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_28">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=679" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-47">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li>The 1st letter of the Serbo-Croatian Latin alphabet (<a href="/wiki/gajica" title="gajica">gajica</a>), followed by <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-48">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.</li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_29">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=680" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-49">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-50">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_9">Conjunction</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=681" title="Edit section: Conjunction">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-51">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/but" title="but">but</a>, <a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a> (compare <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-52">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>)
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-53">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-54">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/while" title="while">while</a> (on the contrary), <a href="/wiki/whereas" title="whereas">whereas</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-55">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-56">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/without" title="without">without</a> (usually after negative verbs)
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-57">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-58">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-59">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-60">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>) <a href="/wiki/and" title="and">and</a> <a href="/wiki/yet" title="yet">yet</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-61">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-62">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-63">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>) not to mention, <a href="/wiki/let_alone" title="let alone">let alone</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-64">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-65">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> + <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-66">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> + <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-67">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>) <a href="/wiki/even_if" title="even if">even if</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-68">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-69">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> + <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-70">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>) and <a href="/wiki/so" title="so">so</a>, and <a href="/wiki/also" title="also">also</a>, and <a href="/wiki/too" title="too">too</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-71">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-72">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_19">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=682" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Attested since the 15th century. Probably of onomatopoeic origin. Compare <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-73">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-74">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-75">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-76">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> and <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-77">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>. These could all derive from Proto-Indo-European interjection <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-78">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, but each form in individual languages could easily be an independent, expressive formation.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_9">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=683" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-79">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/oh" title="oh">oh</a>, <a href="/wiki/ah" title="ah">ah</a>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-80">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ol>
