<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Slovak">Slovak</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=689" title="Edit section: Slovak">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_30">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=690" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-89">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, form of <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-90">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-91">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-92">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-93">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-94">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_30">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=691" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">The <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-96">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/letter" title="letter">letter</a> of the <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-97">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <a href="/wiki/alphabet" title="alphabet">alphabet</a>, written in the <a href="/wiki/Appendix:Latin_script" title="Appendix:Latin script">Latin script</a>.</span></li></ol>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_30">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=693" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-99">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-100">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-101">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>. Cognates include <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-102">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>|tr=a, <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-103">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> and <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-104">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_32">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=713" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-135">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-136">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternative_forms_27">Alternative forms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=714" title="Edit section: Alternative forms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-137">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-138">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li>
<li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-139">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-140">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_35">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=715" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-141">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><a href="/wiki/to" title="to">to</a>
<ul><li><b>1605</b>, Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra, <i>Don Quijote de la Mancha</i><sup><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://books.google.com/books?id=VpUWAAAAYAAJ">1</a></sup>, Chapter I:
<dl><dd>Tenía en su casa una ama que pasaba de los cuarenta y una sobrina que <b>no llegaba a</b> los veinte, y un mozo de campo y plaza que así ensillaba el rocín como tomaba la podadera.
<dl><dd>He had in his house a housekeeper past forty, a niece <b>under</b> twenty, and a lad for the field and market-place, who used to saddle the hack as well as handle the billhook.</dd></dl></dd></dl></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/by" title="by">by</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/at" title="at">at</a></li>
<li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-142">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-143">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ol>

<ul><li>Personal <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-144">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> is not translated into English.</li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Sranan_Tongo">Sranan Tongo</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=719" title="Edit section: Sranan Tongo">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_29">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=720" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-146">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>

<ol><li><a href="/wiki/it" title="it">it</a></li></ol>
<p>&lt;span id="attentionseekingsrn" class="attentionseeking" lang="srn" title="<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-147">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>"&gt;<strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-148">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>

<hr />
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Swahili">Swahili</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=721" title="Edit section: Swahili">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><i>This section is <a href="/wiki/transclusion" title="transclusion">transcluded</a> from <b><a href="/wiki/a/sw" title="a/sw">a/sw</a></b> to work around <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:LUA" class="mw-redirect" title="Wiktionary:LUA">Lua module</a> out-of-memory errors. Please click the link to <b><a href="/wiki/a/sw" title="a/sw">a/sw</a></b> if there are Lua out-of-memory errors on this page.</i>
</p><p><br />
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_17">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a/sw&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-1" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-149">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li>The <a href="/wiki/genitive" title="genitive">genitive</a> <a href="/wiki/particle" title="particle">particle</a>; <a href="/wiki/adjectival" title="adjectival">adjectival</a> particle; <a href="/wiki/of" title="of">of</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_27">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a/sw&amp;action=edit&amp;section=T-2" title="Edit section: ">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li>This particle agrees in class with the noun preceding it</li>
<li>When used as an adjectival particle, the particle itself is untranslated:</li></ol>
<dl><dd><ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-150">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> (lit. "<a href="/wiki/laundry" title="laundry">laundry</a> <a href="/wiki/clothing" title="clothing">clothing</a>")</li>
<li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-151">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ol><li>When used as a genitive particle, the particle is sometimes untranslated:</li></ol>
<dl><dd><ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-152">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul></dd></dl>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_12">Interjection</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=736" title="Edit section: Interjection">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<ol><li><a href="/wiki/eh" title="eh">eh</a>?
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-192">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></span><dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-194">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li></ol>
<div style="background-color: #EEFFF0; padding: 0.5em 1em; border: 1px solid #99FFCC">
<i>This entry has fewer than three known examples of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/use-mention_distinction" class="extiw" title="w:use-mention distinction">actual usage</a>, the minimum considered necessary for clear <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:CFI" class="mw-redirect" title="Wiktionary:CFI">attestation</a>, and may not be reliable. <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-195">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> is subject to a <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:Limited_Documentation_Languages" title="Wiktionary:Limited Documentation Languages">special exemption</a> for languages with limited documentation. If you speak it, please consider <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit">editing this entry</a></span> or <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:Quotations" title="Wiktionary:Quotations">adding citations</a>. See also <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:H" class="mw-redirect" title="Wiktionary:H">Help</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Wiktionary:CP" class="mw-redirect" title="Wiktionary:CP">Community Portal</a>.</i></div>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Letter_39">Letter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=776" title="Edit section: Letter">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_21">Etymology 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=782" title="Edit section: Etymology 3">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-264">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-265">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>, from <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-266">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> (compare <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-267">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> and <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-268">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>).

<ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-271">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> <strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-272">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_12">Etymology 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=786" title="Edit section: Etymology 4">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronunciation_96">Pronunciation</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=787" title="Edit section: Pronunciation">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-273">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun_30">Pronoun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=788" title="Edit section: Pronoun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-274">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong>
</p>
<ol><li><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-275">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong> that, which, who <i>(used in 'direct' relative clauses, i.e. where the pronoun refers to the subject or the direct object of an inflected verb (as opposed to a periphrastic construction with </i><a href="/wiki/bod#Welsh" title="bod">bod</a><i>, to be)).</i>
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-276">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_29">Usage notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=a&amp;action=edit&amp;section=789" title="Edit section: Usage notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>a</i> is not used with the third person singular present of the verb bod, where the relative verb form <i><a href="/wiki/sydd#Welsh" title="sydd">sydd</a></i> is used instead
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-277">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd>Not <i>*Y dyn <b>a</b> yw'n ifanc</i> but <i>Y dyn <b>sydd</b> yn ifanc</i></dd></dl></li>
<li><i>a</i> is not used in indirect relative clauses, where the pronoun is part of a genitive or periphrastic construction. Instead the second relative pronoun <i><a href="/wiki/y#Welsh" title="y">y</a></i> is used
<dl><dd><strong class="error"><span class="scribunto-error" id="mw-scribunto-error-278">Lua error: not enough memory</span></strong></dd>
<dd>"The man whose sister was here": not <i>*Y dyn <b>a</b> oedd ei chwaer yma</i> but <i>Y dyn <b>yr</b> oedd ei chwaer yma</i></dd></dl></li></ol>
